sentences.chinese: 我们在这一主题上的知识存在空白。

sentences.english: The company is trying to fill the skills gap in its workforce.
sentences.chinese: 公司正试图填补其劳动力队伍中的技能差距。

sentences.english: We need to bridge the gap between the old and new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要弥合旧技术和新技术之间的差距。

detailed_translations.chinese: 差距； 间隙； 空白； 隔阂
detailed_translations.english: a difference or lack of something between two things or people

sentences.english: He worked in the garage fixing cars.
sentences.chinese: 他在车库里修理汽车。

sentences.english: They keep their lawnmower in the garage.
sentences.chinese: 他们把割草机放在车库里。

sentences.english: The garage is full of tools and old furniture.
sentences.chinese: 车库里堆满了工具和旧家具。

detailed_translations.english: a building or part of a building used for parking or storing vehicles

sentences.english: Please put the garbage in the bin.
sentences.chinese: 请把垃圾放进垃圾桶里。

sentences.english: The recycling bin is full of garbage.
sentences.chinese: 回收垃圾桶里装满了垃圾。

sentences.english: We should reduce the amount of garbage we produce.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该减少我们产生的垃圾量。

detailed_translations.chinese: 垃圾；废物；无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: waste material consisting of discarded food, packaging, and other refuse

sentences.english: She loves spending time in her garden.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢在花园里度过时光。

sentences.english: We have a small garden behind our house.
sentences.chinese: 我们家屋后有一个小花园。

sentences.english: The garden is full of blooming flowers in spring.
sentences.chinese: 春天，花园里开满了鲜花。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of ground, often near a house, used for growing flowers, fruit, or vegetables

sentences.english: He put the gasoline in the car's gas tank.
sentences.chinese: 他把汽油加进了汽车的油箱里。

sentences.english: The smell of gasoline was strong in the air.
sentences.chinese: 空气中弥漫着浓郁的汽油味。

sentences.english: They need to buy more gasoline for the trip.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要再买些汽油以备旅途之用。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid fuel derived from petroleum and used to power internal-combustion engines

sentences.english: Gender identity is how a person internally understands and experiences their own gender.
sentences.chinese: 性别认同是一个人内心理解和体验自己性别的方式。

sentences.english: The study focuses on the gender gap in income levels.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究关注收入水平的性别差距。

sentences.english: Some languages have more than two genders.
sentences.chinese: 一些语言有多于两种的性别。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being male, female, or neither

sentences.english: This germ of an idea could grow into something great.
sentences.chinese: 这个想法的萌芽可能发展成一件大事。

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed antibiotics to fight the infection caused by the germ.
sentences.chinese: 医生开了抗生素来对抗由细菌引起的感染。

detailed_translations.english: a microscopic organism that causes disease; a tiny seed from which something can grow; the first idea of something

sentences.english: He gave a thumbs-up gesture to indicate approval.
sentences.chinese: 他竖起大拇指表示赞同。

sentences.english: The politician's gesture of apology was seen as insincere by many.
sentences.chinese: 许多人对那位政治家道歉的举动视为不真诚。

sentences.english: Non-verbal gestures can sometimes convey more emotion than words.
sentences.chinese: 非语言手势有时比语言更能传达情感。

detailed_translations.english: a movement of the hand, head, or body to express an idea, feeling, or reaction

sentences.english: The glass shattered when it fell off the table.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃杯从桌子上掉下来时碎了。

sentences.english: She wore glasses to see better.
sentences.chinese: 她戴眼镜看得更清楚。

sentences.english: The window is made of clear glass.
sentences.chinese: 窗户是由透明的玻璃制成的。

detailed_translations.english: a hard clear material that is used for making windows, bottles, etc.

sentences.english: Our main goal is to increase customer satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主要目标是提高客户满意度。

sentences.english: She set a new personal goal for herself.
sentences.chinese: 她为自己设定了一个新的个人目标。

sentences.english: The team worked together to achieve their common goal.
sentences.chinese: 团队共同努力以实现他们的共同目标。

detailed_translations.english: the aim or purpose of something

sentences.english: The gold medal was a symbol of his hard work and dedication.
sentences.chinese: 金牌是他辛勤工作和奉献精神的象征。

sentences.english: The ancient statue was made entirely of gold.
sentences.chinese: 这座古老的雕像完全是用黄金制成的。

sentences.english: The market is experiencing a surge in gold prices.
sentences.chinese: 市场正经历黄金价格的激增。

detailed_translations.english: a yellow metal element that is very valuable and is used to make jewelry and coins
of the color of gold

sentences.english: He plays golf every weekend during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 他在夏天每个周末都打高尔夫球。

sentences.english: The golf course is beautifully maintained.
sentences.chinese: 这个高尔夫球场维护得非常漂亮。

sentences.english: She is learning how to swing a golf club properly.
sentences.chinese: 她正在学习如何正确地挥动高尔夫球杆。

detailed_translations.english: a game in which players use special clubs to hit a small ball into a series of holes on a grassy course

sentences.english: He got a good grade on his test.
sentences.chinese: 他在考试中得了好成绩。

sentences.english: The teacher graded the papers quickly.
sentences.chinese: 老师迅速批改了试卷。

sentences.english: This fruit is ripe and ready to grade.
sentences.chinese: 这种水果已经成熟，可以分级了。

detailed_translations.english: a rank or class of people or things within a graded system
to assess the quality of something or someone and assign a grade or rank to them

sentences.english: She received good grades on her report card.
sentences.chinese: 她在成绩单上得了好成绩。

sentences.english: The student's grades improved significantly after tutoring.
sentences.chinese: 学生在辅导后成绩有了显著提高。

sentences.english: He is worried about his grades in this difficult course.
sentences.chinese: 他担心这门难课的成绩。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or level of quality given to work or performance

sentences.english: She will graduate from university next year.
sentences.chinese: 她明年将从大学毕业。

sentences.english: He graduated with honors in computer science.
sentences.chinese: 他在计算机科学专业以优异的成绩毕业。

sentences.english: Many students graduate and start their careers in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 许多学生毕业后在夏天开始他们的职业生涯。

detailed_translations.english: to complete the studies at a school, college, or university and receive a degree
to finish a course of study

sentences.english: The university will hold a ceremony to honor its graduating students.
sentences.chinese: 大学将举行一个仪式来表彰它的毕业生。

sentences.english: Many graduates go on to pursue higher education or enter the workforce.
sentences.chinese: 许多毕业生继续追求高等教育或进入职场。

detailed_translations.english: a person who has successfully completed a course of study at a college or university

sentences.english: This grain of rice is as small as a mustard seed.
sentences.chinese: 这粒米和芥子一样小。

sentences.english: The grain of the wood is important to consider when cutting it.
sentences.chinese: 切割木材时，木材的纹理很重要。

sentences.english: The photograph came out blurry because the grain was too coarse.
sentences.chinese: 照片拍得模糊，因为颗粒太粗了。

detailed_translations.english: a small hard seed grown for food; the basic form of a grain of matter
a line or pattern of fibers or other elements arranged in a parallel or similar way

sentences.english: The children are playing on the grass in the park.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在公园的草地上玩耍。

sentences.english: The smell of freshly cut grass filled the air.
sentences.chinese: 新割草的香味充满了空气。

sentences.english: He likes to lie on the grass and look at the stars.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢躺在草地上看星星。

detailed_translations.english: a plant with long, narrow leaves that grows on the ground

sentences.english: The grass is green.
sentences.chinese: 草是绿色的。

sentences.english: She has a green thumb.
sentences.chinese: 她很擅长养植物。

sentences.english: The economy is showing signs of turning green.
sentences.chinese: 经济正在显示出向绿色转型的迹象。

detailed_translations.chinese: 绿色的；新生的；有生机的；嫉妒的
detailed_translations.english: of the color of grass; young or inexperienced; full of life and energy; envious
the color of grass; environmentalism

sentences.english: The snow covered the ground all around.
sentences.chinese: 周围的地面都被雪覆盖了。

sentences.english: He fell to the ground with a loud thud.
sentences.chinese: 他随着一声巨响摔到了地上。

sentences.english: The foundation of the house is made of concrete.
sentences.chinese: 这栋房子的地基是混凝土做的。

detailed_translations.english: the surface of the earth
a fact or belief from which something else is based or developed
to fix something firmly in place

sentences.english: They formed a group to study the project together.
sentences.chinese: 他们组成了一个团队一起研究这个项目。

sentences.english: The students were divided into small groups for the activity.
sentences.chinese: 学生们被分成小组进行活动。

sentences.english: She felt like she didn't belong in the group.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得自己不属于这个群体。

detailed_translations.english: a number of people or things that are in a particular place or form a unit
to arrange people or things into groups

sentences.english: The company experienced rapid growth in the last quarter.
sentences.chinese: 公司在上个季度经历了快速增长。

sentences.english: Personal growth is essential for self-improvement.
sentences.chinese: 个人成长对于自我提升至关重要。

sentences.english: Growth of the economy is influenced by various factors.
sentences.chinese: 经济增长受到多种因素的影响。

detailed_translations.english: the process of increasing in size or amount

sentences.english: We invited many guests to our wedding.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请了很多人来参加我们的婚礼。

sentences.english: The hotel has comfortable rooms for guests.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店有舒适的房间供客人使用。

sentences.english: Please treat our guests well.
sentences.chinese: 请善待我们的客人。

detailed_translations.english: a person who is staying somewhere as a visitor
a person who visits a place or organization

sentences.english: She is a guide who knows the area very well.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位非常了解这个地区的向导。

sentences.english: The manual will guide you through the setup process.
sentences.chinese: 手册将指导你完成设置过程。

sentences.english: We need a guide to lead us through the cave.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一位向导带领我们穿过洞穴。

detailed_translations.english: a person who shows people around a place of interest
a book or leaflet giving information about a place that people visit
to show the way or point someone in the right direction

sentences.english: The ship sailed through the narrow gulf separating the two continents.
sentences.chinese: 船只穿过了分隔两大洲的狭窄海湾。

sentences.english: The gulf between their opinions was too wide to bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们之间的意见差距太大，无法弥合。

sentences.english: The oil spill created a gulf of despair in the local community.
sentences.chinese: 石油泄漏在当地社区造成了绝望的鸿沟。

detailed_translations.english: a deep inlet of the sea, smaller than a sea but larger than a bay; a wide difference or gap between two things

sentences.english: I need to talk to that guy over there.
sentences.chinese: 我需要和那边的那个人谈谈。

sentences.english: He's a really nice guy.
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常好的人。

sentences.english: Don't be such a tough guy.
sentences.chinese: 别这么凶。

detailed_translations.english: a man or a boy

sentences.english: I go to the gym three times a week to stay fit.
sentences.chinese: 我每周去健身房三次以保持健康。

sentences.english: The gym has a variety of equipment for different workouts.
sentences.chinese: 健身房有各种用于不同锻炼的设备。

sentences.english: She prefers to work out at home instead of going to the gym.
sentences.chinese: 她更喜欢在家锻炼而不是去健身房。

detailed_translations.english: a place equipped for sports or physical exercise

sentences.english: He developed a bad habit of smoking.
sentences.chinese: 他养成了抽烟的坏习惯。

sentences.english: Breaking the habit was harder than she expected.
sentences.chinese: 打破这个习惯比她预期的要困难。

sentences.english: Good habits are formed by practice.
sentences.chinese: 好习惯是通过练习养成的。

detailed_translations.english: a regular pattern of behaviour that is difficult to give up

sentences.english: He held the baby gently in his hands.
sentences.chinese: 他轻轻地用手抱着婴儿。

sentences.english: The clock has two hands, an hour hand and a minute hand.
sentences.chinese: 这个钟有两个指针，一个时针和一个分针。

sentences.english: She is very skilled with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 她双手都非常有技巧。

detailed_translations.english: an arm with fingers and thumb; the skillful use of both hands; a group of people who work together
to give something to someone with your hand

sentences.english: She plays handball for her local club.
sentences.chinese: 她为当地俱乐部打手球。

sentences.english: Handball is a fast-paced team sport played with gloves.
sentences.chinese: 手球是一项快节奏的团队运动，使用手套进行。

sentences.english: The handball match ended in a draw.
sentences.chinese: 手球比赛以平局结束。

detailed_translations.english: a team sport played on a court with small balls and gloves, in which players try to throw the ball into the opponent's goal

sentences.english: The student referred to the handbook for detailed instructions on the project.
sentences.chinese: 学生在项目上 Refer to the handbook for detailed instructions.

sentences.english: This handbook provides a comprehensive guide to the company's policies and procedures.
sentences.chinese: 这本手册提供了公司政策和程序的全面指南。

detailed_translations.english: a book giving information about a particular subject or giving instructions on how to do something

sentences.english: Good customer service requires effective handling of complaints.
sentences.chinese: 良好的客户服务需要有效处理投诉。

sentences.english: The pilot demonstrated skillful handling of the aircraft during turbulence.
sentences.chinese: 飞行员在湍流中展示了熟练操控飞机的技巧。

sentences.english: Proper handling of hazardous materials is crucial for safety.
sentences.chinese: 妥善处理危险物质对于安全至关重要。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something is dealt with or managed
to deal with or manage a situation, problem, or object

sentences.english: The teacher distributed a handout with important notes at the beginning of the lecture.
sentences.chinese: 老师在上课开始时分发了一份包含重要笔记的手册。

sentences.english: Please pick up the handout from the table outside the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 请从教室外的桌子上拿取手手册。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper or leaflet giving information or instructions, especially one given to members of an audience or class

sentences.english: She wore a hat to protect herself from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她戴着一顶帽子以保护自己免受阳光的伤害。

sentences.english: He picked up a new hat at the store.
sentences.chinese: 他在商店里买了一顶新帽子。

sentences.english: The magician's hat contained a rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 魔术师的帽子里有一只兔子。

detailed_translations.english: a covering for the head, typically consisting of a brim and a flexible crown

sentences.english: I have a terrible headache.
sentences.chinese: 我头疼得厉害。

sentences.english: He got a headache from reading in the bright sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 他在强阳光下看书时头疼了。

sentences.english: She often gets headaches from stress.
sentences.chinese: 她经常因为压力而头疼。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in the head

sentences.english: Make sure the heading of the document is correctly formatted.
sentences.chinese: 确保文档的标题格式正确。

sentences.english: The heading of the chapter clearly indicates its main topic.
sentences.chinese: 章节的标题清楚地表明了其主题。

sentences.english: She added a decorative heading to the top of the letter.
sentences.chinese: 她在信件的顶部加了一个装饰性的标题。

detailed_translations.english: a title or heading, especially at the top of a page or section

sentences.english: Taking care of your physical health is important.
sentences.chinese: 照顾好自己的身体健康很重要。

sentences.english: Mental health is just as crucial as physical health.
sentences.chinese: 心理健康和身体健康同样至关重要。

sentences.english: The doctor advised him to improve his work-life balance for better health.
sentences.chinese: 医生建议他改善工作与生活的平衡以获得更好的健康。

detailed_translations.chinese: 健康； 状态良好； 健康状况
detailed_translations.english: the state of being free from illness or injury

sentences.english: The man has a hearing impairment, so he relies on sign language.
sentences.chinese: 这个男人有听力障碍，所以依赖手语。

sentences.english: We need to protect our hearing from loud noises.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要保护我们的听力免受大声噪音的影响。

sentences.english: Her hearing aid helped her hear the birds singing in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 她的助听器帮助她听到了花园里鸟儿的歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: the sense by which sound is perceived
the ability to hear; the faculty of perceiving sound

sentences.english: Her heart is full of love for her family.
sentences.chinese: 她的心中充满了对家人的爱。

sentences.english: He gave her a gift from the bottom of his heart.
sentences.chinese: 他发自内心地给了她一份礼物。

sentences.english: The runner's heart pounded as he neared the finish line.
sentences.chinese: 当跑步者接近终点线时，他的心跳加速。

detailed_translations.english: the organ that pumps blood through the body; the center of emotions or feelings
a feeling of deep affection or compassion

sentences.english: The heating system in our house needs repairing.
sentences.chinese: 我们家中的供暖系统需要修理。

sentences.english: Turn down the heating to save energy.
sentences.chinese: 调低暖气以节约能源。

sentences.english: The room feels cold because the heating isn't working.
sentences.chinese: 房间感觉很冷，因为暖气不工作。

detailed_translations.english: the process or system of making something warm or hot, especially a building
to make something warm or hot

sentences.english: The hen is laying an egg.
sentences.chinese: 母鸡在下一个蛋。

sentences.english: Don't count your chickens before they hatch.
sentences.chinese: 不要在鸡孵出来之前就数鸡。

detailed_translations.english: a female chicken

sentences.english: She uses fresh herbs to season her dishes.
sentences.chinese: 她使用新鲜的香草来调味她的菜。

sentences.english: This soup is flavored with a variety of herbs.
sentences.chinese: 这款汤用多种香草调味。

sentences.english: Herbs are commonly used in cooking for their flavor.
sentences.chinese: 香草通常用于烹饪，因其风味。

detailed_translations.english: a plant or part of a plant used to add flavor to food

sentences.english: He is a real hero for saving the child.
sentences.chinese: 他拯救了那个孩子，真是个真正的英雄。

sentences.english: The superhero saved the city from the disaster.
sentences.chinese: 这位超级英雄拯救了城市免受灾难。

sentences.english: She looked up to her mother as her hero.
sentences.chinese: 她把母亲当作自己的英雄来仰慕。

detailed_translations.english: a person who is admired or idealized for courage, outstanding achievements, or noble qualities

sentences.english: Many children look up to their parents as heroes.
sentences.chinese: 很多孩子把他们的父母当作英雄来崇拜。

sentences.english: The firefighters were heroes who saved many lives.
sentences.chinese: 消防员是拯救了许多生命的英雄。

sentences.english: She is a local hero for her work in the community.
sentences.chinese: 她因在社区的工作而成为当地的英雄。

detailed_translations.english: a person who is admired or idealized for courage, outstanding achievements, or noble qualities

sentences.english: She is the heroine of our town.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们镇的英雄。

sentences.english: The movie features a strong female heroine.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影塑造了一个强大的女性英雄形象。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who is admired or idealized for her achievements or qualities

sentences.english: We decided to go for a hike in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定去山里徒步。

sentences.english: The price of the hiking boots increased by 20%.
sentences.chinese: 这双徒步靴的价格上涨了20%。

sentences.english: She went hiking every weekend to stay fit.
sentences.chinese: 她每个周末都去徒步以保持健康。

detailed_translations.english: to walk in the countryside, typically for pleasure
to increase or raise the price, amount, or level of something

sentences.english: I love hiking in the mountains on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢周末在山里远足。

sentences.english: We went hiking last Sunday and enjoyed the beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 我们上周日去远足了，欣赏了美丽的风景。

sentences.english: Hiking is a great way to stay fit and explore nature.
sentences.chinese: 远足是保持健康和探索自然的好方法。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of walking in the countryside for pleasure

sentences.english: She gave me a subtle hint that she didn't want to go out.
sentences.chinese: 她给了我一个暗示，她不想出去。

sentences.english: Are you trying to give me a hint about the party?
sentences.chinese: 你是在暗示我关于派对的事情吗？

sentences.english: The teacher hinted at the importance of studying hard.
sentences.chinese: 老师暗示了努力学习的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: a slight suggestion or indication of something
to suggest something indirectly

sentences.english: She gave me some hints on how to improve my presentation.
sentences.chinese: 她就如何改进我的演讲给了我一些暗示。

sentences.english: The book is full of hints and tips for new writers.
sentences.chinese: 这本书充满了对新作者的提示和建议。

sentences.english: Pay attention to the hints the teacher gives during the exam.
sentences.chinese: 注意老师在考试期间给出的提示。

detailed_translations.english: a slight suggestion or indication of something

sentences.english: The historian meticulously researched the ancient manuscripts.
sentences.chinese: 这位历史学家仔细研究了古老的文献手稿。

sentences.english: She is a renowned historian known for her work on medieval Europe.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位著名的历史学家，以其对中世纪欧洲的研究而闻名。

detailed_translations.english: a person who studies and writes about history

sentences.english: He hit the ball with the bat.
sentences.chinese: 他用球棒击中了球。

sentences.english: The news of her success really hit me hard.
sentences.chinese: 她成功的消息真的让我深受打击。

sentences.english: The car hit a tree during the storm.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨中，汽车撞到了一棵树。

detailed_translations.english: to strike or collide with something/someone
to strike or collide with something/someone
a successful or exciting event or moment

sentences.english: These websites get millions of hits every day.
sentences.chinese: 这些网站每天都有数百万的访问量。

sentences.english: The song was a hit in the charts.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌在排行榜上很受欢迎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 击中；成功的事物；受欢迎的人（或事物）
detailed_translations.english: a successful or popular thing or person, especially a song, movie, or book

sentences.english: My hobby is collecting stamps.
sentences.chinese: 我的爱好是集邮。

sentences.english: Reading is a popular hobby among老年人.
sentences.chinese: 阅读是老年人中一个流行的爱好。

sentences.english: He spends a lot of time on his hobby.
sentences.chinese: 他花很多时间在他的爱好上。

detailed_translations.english: an activity that someone does regularly in their spare time for pleasure

sentences.english: We are going on a holiday to the beach next month.
sentences.chinese: 我们下个月要去海滩度假。

sentences.english: She loves spending her holidays in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢在山区度假。

sentences.english: This holiday season, many people travel to find better deals.
sentences.chinese: 在这个假期期间，许多人旅行以寻找更好的交易。

detailed_translations.chinese: 假期； 度假； 休假
detailed_translations.english: a period of time when you are not working or studying, typically one connected with a particular event, place, or activity

sentences.english: I love riding my horse in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在乡间骑我的马。

sentences.english: The horse is known as the 'horsepower' of the agricultural revolution.
sentences.chinese: 马被认为是农业革命的‘马力’。

sentences.english: This old horse is very gentle and likes children.
sentences.chinese: 这匹老马非常温和，喜欢小孩。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal used for riding or pulling heavy things

sentences.english: He was taken to the hospital after the accident.
sentences.chinese: 车祸后，他被送往医院。

sentences.english: She works part-time at a local hospital.
sentences.chinese: 她在当地医院做兼职工作。

sentences.english: The hospital has a special ward for children.
sentences.chinese: 这家医院有一个专门为儿童设立的病房。

detailed_translations.english: an institution providing medical and surgical treatment

sentences.english: She spends most of her weekends doing housework.
sentences.chinese: 她把大多数周末都花在做家务上了。

sentences.english: Housework is usually done by the family members together.
sentences.chinese: 家务通常由家庭成员一起做。

detailed_translations.english: work done around the home, such as cleaning and cooking

sentences.english: The workers are provided with safe and affordable housing.
sentences.chinese: 工人们得到了安全且廉价的住房。

sentences.english: The housing market experienced a significant downturn last year.
sentences.chinese: 住房市场去年经历了显著的下滑。

sentences.english: This apartment offers modern housing with all the necessary amenities.
sentences.chinese: 这套公寓提供了现代化的住房，配备了所有必要的设施。

detailed_translations.english: the act of providing someone with a place to live

sentences.english: Households are the basic units of consumption in an economy.
sentences.chinese: 家庭是经济中消费的基本单位。

sentences.english: The survey collected data from thousands of households.
sentences.chinese: 这项调查收集了数千个家庭的数据。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people living together in one house

sentences.english: She worked for ten hours straight without a break.
sentences.chinese: 她连续工作了十个小时，没有休息。

sentences.english: The train will arrive in two hours.
sentences.chinese: 火车将在两小时后到达。

sentences.english: We spent an hour discussing the project.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了一个小时讨论这个项目。

detailed_translations.english: a period of sixty minutes

sentences.english: We stayed at a nice hotel by the beach.
sentences.chinese: 我们在海滩附近住了一家不错的酒店。

sentences.english: The hotel offers free Wi-Fi to all guests.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店为所有客人提供免费Wi-Fi。

sentences.english: I need to book a hotel room for the conference.
sentences.chinese: 我需要为这次会议预订一个酒店房间。

detailed_translations.english: a building providing accommodation, food, and other services for travelers

sentences.english: The government has set up a hotline for reporting environmental pollution.
sentences.chinese: 政府已设立热线电话，用于举报环境污染。

sentences.english: Please call the customer service hotline if you have any questions.
sentences.chinese: 如果您有任何问题，请拨打客户服务热线。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热线电话；紧急联系通道
detailed_translations.english: a direct telephone number for quick communication, especially for emergencies or customer support

sentences.english: They went on a hunt for the rare bird species.
sentences.chinese: 他们去寻找那种珍稀的鸟类。

sentences.english: The hunter patiently waited for the deer to come closer.
sentences.chinese: 猎人耐心地等待着鹿靠近。

sentences.english: The company is on a hunt for new talent.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正在寻找新的人才。

detailed_translations.english: to search for something or someone, especially over a wide area
the activity of searching for something or someone, especially over a wide area

sentences.english: He went hunting in the woods every weekend.
sentences.chinese: 他每个周末都到树林里去打猎。

sentences.english: The hunter carefully tracked the deer.
sentences.chinese: 猎人小心翼翼地追踪着那只鹿。

sentences.english: Hunting is a popular activity in many rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 在许多农村地区，打猎是一项受欢迎的活动。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of chasing and killing wild animals
to pursue and kill wild animals for food, sport, or trade

sentences.english: I have a great idea for a new project.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个关于新项目的绝佳想法。

sentences.english: Do you have any idea what time it is?
sentences.chinese: 你知道现在几点了吗？

sentences.english: It's not a good idea to leave the house without an umbrella in this weather.
sentences.chinese: 在这种天气里不带雨伞出门可不是一个好主意。

detailed_translations.english: a thought or suggestion as to how something might be done or how a problem can be solved

sentences.english: The identification card is required for entry.
sentences.chinese: 进入时需要身份证。

sentences.english: We need to identify the source of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要找出问题的根源。

sentences.english: Facial identification technology is advancing rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 面部识别技术正在迅速发展。

detailed_translations.english: the process of recognizing or establishing the identity of someone or something
to establish or verify the identity of someone or something

sentences.english: My cultural identity shapes how I view the world.
sentences.chinese: 我的文化认同塑造了我看待世界的方式。

sentences.english: She struggled with her sexual identity throughout her youth.
sentences.chinese: 她在青少年时期一直为自己的性认同而挣扎。

sentences.english: The government enacted policies to protect the identity of its citizens.
sentences.chinese: 政府颁布政策以保护其公民的身份。

detailed_translations.english: the qualities, beliefs, characteristics, and/or expressions that make a person (or group) different from others

sentences.english: The image of the company was damaged by the scandal.
sentences.chinese: 那场丑闻损害了公司的形象。

sentences.english: She tried to improve her public image through charity work.
sentences.chinese: 她试图通过慈善工作来改善自己的公众形象。

sentences.english: The image on the screen was blurry.
sentences.chinese: 屏幕上的图像很模糊。

detailed_translations.english: a visual representation of something; a mental impression
the reputation or public perception of a person or organization
to form a mental image or impression of something

sentences.english: The impact of technology on society is undeniable.
sentences.chinese: 科技对社会的影响是不可否认的。

sentences.english: The new policy will have a significant impact on the economy.
sentences.chinese: 这项新政策将对经济产生重大影响。

sentences.english: The impact of the earthquake was felt across the region.
sentences.chinese: 地震的影响在地区各地都能感受到。

detailed_translations.english: the force or effect of something on a person or thing
to have an effect on someone or something

sentences.english: The imports of raw materials have increased by 20% this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年原材料的进口量增加了20%。

sentences.english: We need to ensure that the imports meet the quality standards.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要确保进口商品符合质量标准。

detailed_translations.english: the action of bringing goods or services into a country from another country

sentences.english: He expressed his inability to complete the task on time.
sentences.chinese: 他表达了他无法按时完成这项任务的无能为力。

sentences.english: The inability to communicate effectively can lead to misunderstandings.
sentences.chinese: 无法有效沟通可能导致误解。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无能为力；不能；缺乏能力
detailed_translations.english: the quality or state of not being able to do something

sentences.english: The incoming train will arrive in five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这趟进站列车将在五分钟后到达。

sentences.english: We need to prepare for the incoming guests.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要为即将到来的客人做准备。

detailed_translations.english: arriving or coming in

sentences.english: The index of the book shows the main topics covered in each chapter.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的索引显示了每一章涵盖的主要内容。

sentences.english: Please look up the word 'index' in the dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 请在字典中查找单词'index'。

sentences.english: The stock market index reached an all-time high today.
sentences.chinese: 今天的股票市场指数达到了历史最高点。

detailed_translations.english: a list of words or topics and the pages on which they are mentioned in a book
a number that shows the level of something compared with a fixed standard
to arrange the words and topics in a book in alphabetical order and note the page numbers where they appear

sentences.english: The automotive industry is one of the largest industries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业是世界上最大的工业之一。

sentences.english: She is working in the tech industry.
sentences.chinese: 她在科技行业工作。

sentences.english: The fashion industry is known for its fast pace.
sentences.chinese: 时尚行业以其快节奏而闻名。

detailed_translations.english: a group of companies that do similar things, such as making the same product or providing the same service

sentences.english: He contracted a serious infection after the surgery.
sentences.chinese: 手术之后，他感染了一种严重的感染。

sentences.english: Proper hygiene can help prevent the spread of infection.
sentences.chinese: 良好的卫生习惯可以帮助预防感染的传播。

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed antibiotics to treat the infection.
sentences.chinese: 医生开了抗生素来治疗感染。

detailed_translations.english: a disease that is caused by microorganisms and that spreads from infected person to infected person

sentences.english: She has a significant influence on her family's decisions.
sentences.chinese: 她对家人的决定有很大的影响力。

sentences.english: The internet can greatly influence people's opinions.
sentences.chinese: 互联网可以极大地影响人们的观点。

sentences.english: His parents influenced him to pursue a career in medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母影响他追求医学事业。

detailed_translations.english: the power to affect someone or something
to have an effect on someone or something

sentences.english: We need more information to make a decision.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要更多的信息来做决定。

sentences.english: The internet is a vast source of information.
sentences.chinese: 互联网是一个庞大的信息来源。

sentences.english: Please provide accurate information.
sentences.chinese: 请提供准确的信息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 信息； 通知； 资料
detailed_translations.english: facts and details about a particular subject, person, event, etc.

sentences.english: He received a vaccination injection to prevent the disease.
sentences.chinese: 为了预防疾病，他接受了一次疫苗接种。

sentences.english: The nurse administered the injection quickly and efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 护士快速高效地完成了注射。

sentences.english: The drug was given to the patient through an intravenous injection.
sentences.chinese: 药物通过静脉注射给予患者。

detailed_translations.english: the act of putting a liquid into a person's or animal's body with a syringe

sentences.english: He sustained a serious leg injury during the football match.
sentences.chinese: 他在足球比赛中受了严重的腿部伤。

sentences.english: The injury kept him out of action for several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 这次受伤使他几周都无法参加比赛。

sentences.english: She received a minor injury while jogging.
sentences.chinese: 她慢跑时不小心受了点小伤。

detailed_translations.english: physical harm or damage to the body resulting from an accident, violence, or medical error

sentences.english: Many people enjoy traveling to inland areas for their peacefulness.
sentences.chinese: 许多人喜欢去内陆地区旅行，因为那里很宁静。

sentences.english: The ship cannot sail inland due to the shallow waters.
sentences.chinese: 由于水深较浅，船无法驶入内陆。

detailed_translations.english: located in the interior of a country, not near the coast

sentences.english: Insects are the most diverse group of animals on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫是地球上种类最多的动物群体。

sentences.english: Many insects play important roles in ecosystems, such as pollination.
sentences.chinese: 许多昆虫在生态系统中扮演着重要角色，例如传粉。

sentences.english: Some insects can be harmful to crops and humans.
sentences.chinese: 有些昆虫可能对农作物和人类有害。

detailed_translations.english: a small six-legged arthropod with a body divided into three parts and usually two pairs of wings

sentences.english: He has been suffering from insomnia for several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他几个星期以来一直受到失眠的困扰。

sentences.english: Lack of sleep can lead to insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠不足可能导致失眠。

detailed_translations.english: a sleep disorder characterized by difficulty in falling or staying asleep

sentences.english: The new institute offers a wide range of courses for students.
sentences.chinese: 这家新学院为学生提供了广泛的课程。

sentences.english: The government established an institute to research environmental issues.
sentences.chinese: 政府成立了一个研究所来研究环境问题。

sentences.english: She was admitted to a prestigious institute of technology.
sentences.chinese: 她被一所著名的技术学院录取了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 学院； 研究所； 机构
detailed_translations.english: an organization established for a particular purpose, such as education or research
to set up or establish an organization or system

sentences.english: The university is a prestigious institution of learning.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学是著名的学术机构。

sentences.english: The legal system is a fundamental institution in society.
sentences.chinese: 法律体系是社会的基本制度。

sentences.english: This charity institution provides help to the homeless.
sentences.chinese: 这家慈善机构为无家可归者提供帮助。

detailed_translations.english: an organization or establishment established for a particular purpose, such as education, religion, or government

sentences.english: Please follow the instructions carefully.
sentences.chinese: 请仔细按照说明操作。

sentences.english: The instructions for use are printed on the box.
sentences.chinese: 使用说明印在盒子上。

sentences.english: She received detailed instructions on how to handle the emergency.
sentences.chinese: 她收到了关于如何处理紧急情况的详细指示。

detailed_translations.english: a set of directions or instructions about how to do something

sentences.english: The instructor explained the concepts clearly to the students.
sentences.chinese: 老师向学生清晰地解释了这些概念。

sentences.english: She has been an instructor at this university for over ten years.
sentences.chinese: 她在这所大学担任讲师已经超过十年了。

sentences.english: The instructor assigned additional reading materials for the next class.
sentences.chinese: 这位讲师为下一节课分配了额外的阅读材料。

detailed_translations.chinese: 教师； 讲师； 指导者
detailed_translations.english: a person qualified to teach students, especially in a particular subject or field

sentences.english: This musical instrument is very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 这个乐器非常昂贵。

sentences.english: The doctor used a stethoscope, an instrument for listening to the heart.
sentences.chinese: 医生使用听诊器，这是一种用来听心脏的仪器。

sentences.english: She played the piano beautifully; it was a truly remarkable instrument.
sentences.chinese: 她演奏钢琴非常优美；那真是一件了不起的乐器。

detailed_translations.english: a thing or machine that is used for a particular purpose, especially one that is used in science or medicine

sentences.english: He has a strong interest in history.
sentences.chinese: 他对历史有浓厚的兴趣。

sentences.english: The interest rate on the loan is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 这笔贷款的利率相当高。

sentences.english: They have a mutual interest in the success of the project.
sentences.chinese: 他们共同关心这个项目的成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 兴趣； 关注； 利息
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of curiosity or concern about someone or something
an advantage or benefit
the charge for the use of money

sentences.english: The Internet has revolutionized the way we communicate and access information.
sentences.chinese: 互联网彻底改变了我们的沟通方式和获取信息的方式。

sentences.english: Many people rely on the Internet for their daily news and entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 许多人依赖互联网获取日常新闻和娱乐。

detailed_translations.english: a global network of connected computers that allows people to share information and communicate with each other

sentences.english: The interviewer asked me about my previous work experience.
sentences.chinese: 面试官问我之前的工作经验。

sentences.english: She was a friendly and professional interviewer.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位友好且专业的面试官。

sentences.english: The interviewer seemed interested in my answers.
sentences.chinese: 面试官似乎对我的答案很感兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: a person who conducts an interview

sentences.english: The introduction of new technology changed the entire industry.
sentences.chinese: 新技术的引入改变了整个行业。

sentences.english: She gave a warm introduction to the new colleague.
sentences.chinese: 她热情地向新同事介绍了情况。

sentences.english: This book provides an introduction to quantum physics.
sentences.chinese: 这本书为量子物理学提供了入门介绍。

detailed_translations.english: the act of introducing something new; a beginning or starting point
to present someone or something to another person or group, or to bring something new into use

sentences.english: The skilled investigator carefully examined the crime scene.
sentences.chinese: 这位熟练的调查员仔细检查了犯罪现场。

sentences.english: She is a dedicated investigator who works long hours to solve complex cases.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位投入的调查员，为了解决复杂的案件而长时间工作。

sentences.english: The investigator gathered evidence to build a strong case against the suspect.
sentences.chinese: 调查员收集证据，以对嫌疑人提起强有力的指控。

detailed_translations.english: a person who investigates things, especially crimes or official matters

sentences.english: Investment in education pays off in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 对教育的投资从长远来看是有回报的。

sentences.english: They decided to make a significant investment in the new project.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定在新项目中进行一项重大投资。

sentences.english: Real estate is a popular investment for many people.
sentences.chinese: 房地产是许多人受欢迎的投资。

detailed_translations.english: the money that is invested in something to make a profit
to put money or time into something in order to make a profit or get something back

sentences.english: Modern irrigation techniques help to conserve water and increase crop yields.
sentences.chinese: 现代灌溉技术有助于节约用水和提高农作物产量。

sentences.english: The ancient Egyptians developed an advanced irrigation system to farm along the Nile River.
sentences.chinese: 古埃及人开发了一个先进的灌溉系统，以便在尼罗河沿岸耕作。

sentences.english: Irrigation is essential for agriculture in arid regions.
sentences.chinese: 灌溉对于干旱地区的农业至关重要。

detailed_translations.english: the act or process of artificially supplying water to land to make it more productive

sentences.english: The Galapagos Islands are known for their unique wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 加拉帕戈斯群岛以其独特的野生动物而闻名。

sentences.english: They spent the weekend on a remote island in the Caribbean.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加勒比海的一个偏远岛屿上度过了周末。

sentences.english: Many people dream of living on a tropical island.
sentences.chinese: 许多人梦想住在热带岛屿上。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

sentences.english: The isolation of the research station made the experience both challenging and rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 研究站的孤立环境让这次经历既充满挑战又令人有成就感。

sentences.english: She felt a sense of isolation after moving to the small town with no friends or family nearby.
sentences.chinese: 搬到一个没有朋友或家人在附近的小镇后，她感到一种孤立感。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being separated from other people or things

sentences.english: This item is on the shopping list.
sentences.chinese: 这个物品在购物清单上。

sentences.english: Please return the item to the store.
sentences.chinese: 请将物品归还商店。

sentences.english: The museum displayed a rare item from ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆展示了一件来自古代的珍贵物品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 物品； 项目； 条款
detailed_translations.english: a single thing or piece of something

sentences.english: She wore a light jacket because it was a bit chilly.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一件轻便的夹克，因为有点凉。

sentences.english: He took off his jacket after he got inside the house.
sentences.chinese: 他进屋后脱掉了夹克。

sentences.english: The children were playing with a old jacket.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们正在玩一件旧夹克。

detailed_translations.english: a short coat, typically with sleeves and a collar, worn over a shirt or blouse

sentences.english: I love to spread jam on my toast.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在吐司上涂果酱。

sentences.english: The concert was so crowded that we couldn't move.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会太拥挤了，我们动弹不得。

sentences.english: She jammed the key into the lock.
sentences.chinese: 她把钥匙插进了锁里。

detailed_translations.english: a sweet spread made of fruit, sugar, and water
to force something into a tight space or to press something tightly against a surface

sentences.english: He clenched his jaw as he listened to the bad news.
sentences.chinese: 他咬紧牙关听着这个坏消息。

sentences.english: The dentist examined her jaw carefully.
sentences.chinese: 牙医仔细检查了她的下巴。

sentences.english: She had a slight jaw injury from the fall.
sentences.chinese: 她从摔倒中伤到了下巴。

detailed_translations.english: the part of the face below the mouth, consisting of the lower jawbone

sentences.english: She was wearing a pair of blue jeans.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条蓝色的牛仔裤。

sentences.english: Do you need to buy new jeans?
sentences.chinese: 你需要买新的牛仔裤吗？

sentences.english: These jeans are very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这些牛仔裤非常舒适。

detailed_translations.english: a type of strong fabric, typically blue, used for making trousers

sentences.english: She keeps a personal journal to write down her thoughts and feelings.
sentences.chinese: 她保持一个私人日记来记录她的思想和感受。

sentences.english: The research journal published his findings on climate change.
sentences.chinese: 研究期刊发表了他在气候变化方面的发现。

detailed_translations.english: a written record of events, feelings, or reflections kept regularly; a periodical containing articles, reports, or other matter written by experts in a particular field

sentences.english: You should not judge a book by its cover.
sentences.chinese: 不能以貌取人。

sentences.english: The judge will decide who is guilty.
sentences.chinese: 法官将决定谁有罪。

sentences.english: She judges people by their actions, not their words.
sentences.chinese: 她根据人的行为而不是言语来判断人。

detailed_translations.english: to form an opinion or estimate of someone or something after consideration
a person who presides over a court of law and passes sentences on those accused of crimes

sentences.english: I need to squeeze the juice out of these oranges.
sentences.chinese: 我需要从这些橙子中榨出汁来。

sentences.english: The juice of this fruit is very sweet.
sentences.chinese: 这种水果的汁非常甜。

sentences.english: He drank a glass of orange juice this morning.
sentences.chinese: 他今天早上喝了一杯橙汁。

detailed_translations.english: the liquid part of a fruit or vegetable that is pressed out
the pleasure or enjoyment that something gives you

sentences.english: The train station is a major junction for several railway lines.
sentences.chinese: 火车站是几条铁路线的主要交汇点。

sentences.english: At the junction of the two roads, they decided to take the left one.
sentences.chinese: 在两条路的交汇处，他们决定走左边的路。

sentences.english: The traffic junction can get very congested during rush hour.
sentences.chinese: 交通枢纽在高峰时段会非常拥堵。

detailed_translations.english: a place where two or more things (such as roads, lines, or paths) meet or cross

sentences.english: She is a junior software developer at the company.
sentences.chinese: 她是在这家公司担任初级软件工程师。

sentences.english: The junior class students are preparing for their final exams.
sentences.chinese: 初年级的学生正在准备他们的期末考试。

detailed_translations.chinese: 初级的；年幼的；资历较浅的
detailed_translations.english: relating to a position or level of study that is lower than another

sentences.english: She is the team's best goalkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 她是球队的最佳门将。

sentences.english: The museum has a special keeper for ancient artifacts.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆有一位专门负责古代文物的管理员。

sentences.english: He is the keeper of the town's secret.
sentences.chinese: 他是守护小镇秘密的人。

detailed_translations.english: a person who guards or keeps something
a person responsible for looking after something or someone

sentences.english: Divers explore the vibrant ecosystem beneath the kelp forests.
sentences.chinese: 潜水员探索了海底茂密的海藻林中的活跃生态系统。

sentences.english: Seals often rest on floating kelp fronds near the surface.
sentences.chinese: 海豹经常在靠近水面的漂浮海藻丝上休息。

sentences.english: Kelp is a type of large brown seaweed commonly found in coastal waters.
sentences.chinese: 海藻是一种常见于沿海水域的大型褐藻。

detailed_translations.english: a large brown seaweed that grows in cold seas and is eaten by some animals

sentences.english: The keyword 'sustainability' is central to our company's mission.
sentences.chinese: 关键词“可持续性”是我们公司使命的核心。

sentences.english: Please include the keyword 'innovation' in your proposal.
sentences.chinese: 请在你的提案中包含关键词“创新”。

detailed_translations.english: a word or phrase that is used to search for information on the internet or in a database

sentences.english: Don't kid yourself, you need to study more if you want to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 别自欺欺人，如果你想通过考试，你需要学习更多。

sentences.english: She asked if he was kidding when he said he could fix the car in an hour.
sentences.chinese: 她问他是不是在开玩笑，因为他说他能在一个小时修好车。

sentences.english: He decided to kid his boss by arriving late for work one day.
sentences.chinese: 他决定有一天上班迟到来捉弄他的老板。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone believe something that is not true, often in order to amuse them
to make jokes or play tricks on someone

sentences.english: The king ruled with wisdom and fairness.
sentences.chinese: 国王以智慧和公正统治。

sentences.english: She felt like a princess in the palace.
sentences.chinese: 在宫殿里，她感觉自己像一位公主。

sentences.english: The king's speech inspired the nation.
sentences.chinese: 国王的演讲激励了整个国家。

detailed_translations.english: a male ruler of a country, such as a king or a queen
a very important or powerful person

sentences.english: You can purchase tickets for the museum at the kiosk near the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在入口附近的信息亭购买博物馆的门票。

sentences.english: The public library has a kiosk where you can borrow books and magazines.
sentences.chinese: 公共图书馆有一个信息亭，你可以在那里借阅书籍和杂志。

sentences.english: The kiosk displays the latest weather forecast and news updates.
sentences.chinese: 信息亭展示了最新的天气预报和新闻更新。

detailed_translations.english: a small booth offering goods or services, especially in a public place

sentences.english: She packed her first-aid kit before going on the hiking trip.
sentences.chinese: 在去徒步旅行之前，她打包了她的急救包。

sentences.english: This software development kit includes everything you need to build mobile applications.
sentences.chinese: 这个软件开发套件包含了构建移动应用程序所需的一切。

sentences.english: The artist's kit included brushes, paints, and a canvas.
sentences.chinese: 艺术家的工具包包括画笔、颜料和画布。

detailed_translations.english: a set of tools, equipment, or materials for a particular purpose or activity

sentences.english: She was busy preparing a meal in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 她正忙着在厨房准备一顿饭。

sentences.english: The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances.
sentences.chinese: 这个厨房配备了现代化的电器。

sentences.english: He dropped a plate and made a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 他掉了一个盘子，在厨房里弄得一团糟。

detailed_translations.english: a room or area where food is prepared and cooked

sentences.english: She has a complete sewing kit for various projects.
sentences.chinese: 她有一套完整的缝纫工具，适用于各种项目。

sentences.english: The emergency kit includes first aid supplies and a flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 应急包包括急救用品和手电筒。

detailed_translations.english: a set of tools, equipment, or materials for a particular purpose

sentences.english: He cut the fruit with a sharp knife.
sentences.chinese: 他用一把锋利的刀切水果。

sentences.english: She always carries a small knife for emergencies.
sentences.chinese: 她总是随身带一把小刀以备不时之需。

sentences.english: The chef used a knife to slice the meat thinly.
sentences.chinese: 厨师用刀把肉切得很薄。

detailed_translations.english: a tool with a sharp blade used for cutting things

sentences.english: He has a deep knowledge of history.
sentences.chinese: 他对历史有深入的了解。

sentences.english: Knowledge is power.
sentences.chinese: 知识就是力量。

sentences.english: The library is a great source of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆是知识的宝库。

detailed_translations.english: facts, information, and skills acquired through experience or education

sentences.english: The koala is a small, tree-dwelling marsupial native to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 考拉是一种小型、树栖的有袋动物，原产于澳大利亚。

sentences.english: Koalas are known for their slow movement and sedentary lifestyle.
sentences.chinese: 考拉以其缓慢的运动和久坐的生活方式而闻名。

sentences.english: The laboratory is equipped with advanced instruments.
sentences.chinese: 实验室配备了先进的仪器。

sentences.english: She conducted experiments in the lab throughout the week.
sentences.chinese: 她整个星期都在实验室做实验。

sentences.english: He works in a biology lab at the university.
sentences.chinese: 他在大学的一个生物实验室工作。

detailed_translations.english: a place equipped for scientific research

sentences.english: We went for a swim in the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在湖里游泳了。

sentences.english: The lake is frozen in winter.
sentences.chinese: 冬天湖面结冰了。

sentences.english: They built a small boat on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他们在湖上建了一艘小船。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of water surrounded by land

sentences.english: I need to buy a new lamp for my study.
sentences.chinese: 我需要给我学习的地方买一个新的灯。

sentences.english: The lamp on the table is very bright.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上的灯非常亮。

sentences.english: She turned off the lamp and went to bed.
sentences.chinese: 她关掉了灯，然后去睡觉了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture that provides light

sentences.english: The ship finally landed on the shore after a long journey.
sentences.chinese: 经过漫长的旅程，船终于靠岸了。

sentences.english: They landed the plane safely despite the bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 尽管天气恶劣，他们还是安全着陆了飞机。

sentences.english: He landed a job as a software engineer right after graduation.
sentences.chinese: 他毕业后立即找到了一份软件工程师的工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使（飞机、船等）降落；使（某人）获得（工作、职位等）
detailed_translations.english: to bring an aircraft or ship down to the ground

name: landmark
trans: 标志性的建筑； 路标

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是巴黎的一个著名地标。

sentences.english: This ancient temple is an important landmark in the city.
sentences.chinese: 这座古老的寺庙是这座城市的一个重要地标。

sentences.english: We passed several notable landmarks on our way to the conference.
sentences.chinese: 我们在去会议的路上经过了几个著名的地标。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地标；里程碑；显著的例子
detailed_translations.english: a place that is famous or important because of its history, culture, or architecture

sentences.english: The changing landscape of technology is constantly creating new opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 不断变化的技术格局正在不断创造新的机遇。

sentences.english: The rural landscape was breathtakingly beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 乡村风光美得令人屏息。

sentences.english: The company is trying to landscape its brand for a younger audience.
sentences.chinese: 该公司正试图为其年轻受众重塑品牌形象。

detailed_translations.english: the visible features of an area of land, including physical features such as hills and rivers and human-made features such as buildings

sentences.english: Language is the expression of thought.
sentences.chinese: 语言是思想的表达。

sentences.english: She is learning English as a second language.
sentences.chinese: 她正在学习英语作为第二语言。

sentences.english: The study of language is known as linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 语言的研究被称为语言学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 语言； 说话； 手势
detailed_translations.english: a system of communication used by a particular community or country

sentences.english: I always carry my laptop with me to work.
sentences.chinese: 我总是带着我的笔记本电脑去上班。

sentences.english: She is working on her laptop in the coffee shop.
sentences.chinese: 她在咖啡店里用笔记本电脑工作。

sentences.english: This laptop has a long battery life.
sentences.chinese: 这款笔记本电脑的电池寿命很长。

detailed_translations.english: a portable computer

sentences.english: The doctor used a laser to remove the tattoo.
sentences.chinese: 医生用激光去除了纹身。

sentences.english: Laser printers are known for their speed and quality.
sentences.chinese: 激光打印机以其速度和品质而闻名。

sentences.english: The laser beam is very precise and can cut through metal.
sentences.chinese: 激光束非常精确，可以切割金属。

detailed_translations.english: an apparatus that produces a narrow beam of intense light that can be used to cut, burn, or treat tissue in surgery, to read bar codes, etc.

sentences.english: The lava flowed down the sides of the volcano.
sentences.chinese: 熔岩从火山两侧流下。

sentences.english: The black sand on the beach was formed from cooled lava.
sentences.chinese: 海滩上的黑色沙子是由冷却的熔岩形成的。

sentences.english: Geologists studied the lava to understand the volcano's activity.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家研究熔岩以了解火山的活动。

detailed_translations.english: molten rock that flows from a volcano or fissure

sentences.english: She is a successful lawyer who practices in international law.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位在国际法领域执业的成功律师。

sentences.english: He consults with his lawyer before signing any contract.
sentences.chinese: 他在签署任何合同前都会咨询他的律师。

sentences.english: The lawyer argued strongly for his client in court.
sentences.chinese: 律师在法庭上为他的当事人进行了有力的辩护。

detailed_translations.english: a person who advises clients on legal matters and represents them in court

sentences.english: We need to add another layer of security to the system.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要为系统增加一层安全性。

sentences.english: The cake has multiple layers of frosting and filling.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕有多层糖霜和填充物。

sentences.english: She wore a thin layer of clothing to stay warm.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着薄薄的一层衣服来保暖。

detailed_translations.english: a sheet, stratum, or level of something

sentences.english: She gave a fascinating lecture on the history of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 她发表了一场关于宇宙历史的引人入胜的讲座。

sentences.english: The students were sleeping during the boring lecture.
sentences.chinese: 学生们在无聊的讲座中睡着了。

sentences.english: He attended a lecture on artificial intelligence last night.
sentences.chinese: 他昨晚参加了一场关于人工智能的讲座。

detailed_translations.english: a talk given to an audience on a particular subject, typically as part of a series of talks

sentences.english: The university hired a new lecturer to teach introductory physics.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学聘请了一位新的讲师来教授入门物理。

sentences.english: During the lecture, the lecturer used many diagrams to explain complex theories.
sentences.chinese: 在讲座期间，讲师使用了许多图表来解释复杂的理论。

sentences.english: She is a guest lecturer who comes to our campus twice a month.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位客座讲师，每月来我们校园两次。

detailed_translations.english: a teacher or speaker at a university or college

sentences.english: She enjoys her leisure time by reading books and gardening.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢在闲暇时间读书和园艺。

sentences.english: Many people struggle to find leisure time after a long workday.
sentences.chinese: 许多人下班后很难找到闲暇时间。

sentences.english: The company offers flexible working hours to ensure employees have more leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 公司提供弹性工作时间，以确保员工有更多闲暇时间。

detailed_translations.english: time when you are not working or doing something active

sentences.english: I love to drink lemon water in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢早上喝柠檬水。

sentences.english: The cake was topped with a fresh slice of lemon.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕上撒了一片新鲜的柠檬。

sentences.english: This dish is best served with a squeeze of lemon.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜最好挤上一些柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: a yellow citrus fruit with a sour taste

detailed_translations.chinese: 柠檬色的； 柠檬味的
detailed_translations.english: of the color of a lemon

sentences.english: The lender provided a loan to help the business expand.
sentences.chinese: 贷款人提供了一笔贷款以帮助公司扩张。

sentences.english: We need to find a reliable lender for this project.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要为这个项目找到一个可靠的贷款人。

sentences.english: The lender requires a collateral for this mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 这位贷款人要求抵押品来支持这笔抵押贷款。

detailed_translations.english: a person or organization that lends money

sentences.english: The length of the room is ten meters.
sentences.chinese: 房间的长度是十米。

sentences.english: Please measure the length of the fabric.
sentences.chinese: 请测量布料的长度。

detailed_translations.chinese: 长度； 时间； 长度
detailed_translations.english: the measurement or extent of something from end to end

sentences.english: We learned a valuable lesson from our mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 我们从错误中学到了宝贵的教训。

sentences.english: The teacher gave the students a lesson on history.
sentences.chinese: 老师给学生上了历史课。

sentences.english: He took a cooking lesson to improve his culinary skills.
sentences.chinese: 他参加了一个烹饪课程来提高他的烹饪技能。

detailed_translations.english: a period of instruction or teaching
something that is or can be learned from experience

sentences.english: She wrote a personal letter to her grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 她给祖母写了一封亲笔信。

sentences.english: The letter was addressed to Mr. John Doe.
sentences.chinese: 信是寄给约翰·杜的先生的。

sentences.english: He received a letter of congratulations from his friend.
sentences.chinese: 他收到了朋友的一封祝贺信。

detailed_translations.english: a written message addressed to a particular person or organization
a character of the alphabet

sentences.english: He levelled the ground before building the shed.
sentences.chinese: 他在建造小屋前把地面整平了。

sentences.english: The room was level with the ground floor.
sentences.chinese: 这个房间和一楼一样高。

sentences.english: She kept a level head during the emergency.
sentences.chinese: 在紧急情况下，她保持镇定。

detailed_translations.english: a position or level that is the same as that of something else
a standard of quality, achievement, or development
to make something flat or even; to bring something to the same level as something else
to aim a weapon or other object at something

sentences.english: I went to the library to borrow some books.
sentences.chinese: 我去了图书馆借了一些书。

sentences.english: The university library has a vast collection of academic journals.
sentences.chinese: 大学的图书馆有大量的学术期刊。

sentences.english: She spent the afternoon reading in the library.
sentences.chinese: 她花了一个下午在图书馆里阅读。

detailed_translations.english: a building or room that contains collections of books, periodicals, and other reference materials for people to read, borrow, or study

sentences.english: She had to lift the heavy box to put it on the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 她不得不抬起那个沉重的箱子把它放到架子上。

sentences.english: The magician lifted the silk handkerchief from the audience.
sentences.chinese: 魔术师从观众手中拿起那块丝手帕。

sentences.english: The elevator lift took us to the top floor.
sentences.chinese: 电梯把我们带到了顶层。

detailed_translations.english: to raise or move something upwards

sentences.english: The light turned on, illuminating the room.
sentences.chinese: 灯亮了，照亮了房间。

sentences.english: She prefers the light blue shirt.
sentences.chinese: 她更喜欢浅蓝色的衬衫。

sentences.english: The light of the moon shone through the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 月光透过云层洒下。

detailed_translations.english: the natural agent that stimulates sight and makes things visible
a piece of apparatus that provides artificial light
having much light or bright colour
to supply light to; illuminate

sentences.english: The line is busy.
sentences.chinese: 电话线路正忙。

sentences.english: She stood in the line for a new iPhone.
sentences.chinese: 她排队购买新iPhone。

sentences.english: This product line is very popular.
sentences.chinese: 这一系列产品非常受欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: a long, thin mark or strip of a particular color, material, or shape
a queue of people or vehicles waiting for something
a set of related products produced by a company
to connect something to a telephone system or network

sentences.english: The lion is the king of the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 狮子是森林之王。

sentences.chinese: 她保持着一个待办事项列表。

sentences.chinese: 离开前请锁上门。

sentences.chinese: 他用密码锁锁了他的自行车。

sentences.chinese: 乘客们被允许在火车宽敞的休息室里闲坐。

sentences.english: Her loyalty to the company was unwavering.
sentences.chinese: 她对公司的忠诚坚定不移。

sentences.chinese: 有时候，运气在成功中扮演着重要的角色。

sentences.chinese: 吸烟会严重损害你的肺部。

sentences.chinese: 这台机器用于包装产品。

sentences.chinese: 我今天早上收到一封重要的邮件。

sentences.chinese: 在这门课中，大多数学生都参加了高级项目。

sentences.chinese: 狮子的鬃毛是其最显著的特征。

sentences.chinese: 这家公司在几个不同的国家制造汽车。

sentences.chinese: 我们需要一张地图来导航穿过这座城市。

sentences.chinese: 请在试卷上标记正确的答案。

sentences.chinese: 有效的营销可以显著增加公司的销售额。

sentences.chinese: 湿地是许多物种的重要栖息地，包括沼泽鸟类。

sentences.chinese: 他是他手艺的大师。

sentences.chinese: 他坐在角落里的垫子上。

sentences.chinese: 她把垫子放下，开始吃饭。

sentences.chinese: 我们需要找到一个与现有装饰相匹配的颜色。

sentences.chinese: 我们需要为这个项目收集所有必要的材料。

sentences.chinese: 随着成熟，他优雅且理解地处理了冲突。

sentences.chinese: 成熟伴随着年龄、经验和自我意识而来。

sentences.chinese: 这辆车的最高速度是每小时200公里。

sentences.chinese: 我通常晚餐吃一大顿。

sentences.chinese: 他们一起享用了一顿丰盛的餐食。

sentences.chinese: 这家酒店提供免费早餐。

sentences.chinese: 我们需要测量这个房间的长度。

sentences.chinese: 你如何衡量成功？

sentences.chinese: 我们需要为这个建筑项目进行精确的测量。

sentences.chinese: 医生测量了她的血压，作为医疗检查的一部分。

sentences.chinese: 我喜欢每天吃肉。

sentences.chinese: 牛肉和鸡肉是常见的肉类。

sentences.chinese: 媒体在选举中扮演了重要角色。

sentences.chinese: 她在一家媒体公司工作。

sentences.chinese: 新闻媒体经常报道有偏见的消息。

sentences.chinese: 他每天服用药物来控制他的血压。

sentences.chinese: 医生给她开了一种新的药物来治疗她的过敏。

sentences.chinese: 确保仔细遵循药物说明。

sentences.chinese: 她按照医生的处方每天服用两次药。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine has been used for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 传统中医已经使用了数千年。

sentences.english: The medicine helped relieve his symptoms quickly.
sentences.chinese: 药物很快帮助缓解了他的症状。

sentences.english: She has a medium build.
sentences.chinese: 她的身材中等。

sentences.chinese: 消息是通过一个中介发送的。

sentences.chinese: 这个镜头的焦距是中等的。

detailed_translations.english: of a size, amount, or degree that is more than small but less than large

sentences.english: She developed a new method for teaching mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 她开发了一种新的教学方法。

sentences.english: The scientific method involves careful observation and experimentation.
sentences.chinese: 科学方法包括仔细的观察和实验。

sentences.english: We need to find a more efficient method to complete this project.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要找到一个更有效的方法来完成这个项目。

detailed_translations.english: a way of doing something or achieving an aim

sentences.english: She picked up the microphone and began to sing.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起麦克风开始唱歌。

sentences.english: The speaker used a wireless microphone for better mobility.
sentences.chinese: 演讲者使用无线麦克风以获得更好的移动性。

sentences.english: Make sure the microphone is properly connected before you start speaking.
sentences.chinese: 在开始说话之前，确保麦克风已正确连接。

sentences.english: Bird migration patterns are influenced by climate changes.
sentences.chinese: 鸟类的迁徙模式受到气候变化的影响。

sentences.english: Human migration has been a part of human history for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 人类迁徙是人类历史几千年来的一部分。

sentences.english: The study of animal migration helps scientists understand ecosystems better.
sentences.chinese: 对动物迁徙的研究帮助科学家更好地理解生态系统。

detailed_translations.english: the movement of people or animals from one place to another, usually over a long distance

sentences.chinese: 这辆车五分钟行驶了一英里。

sentences.english: She ran a mile every morning for exercise.
sentences.chinese: 她每天早上跑一英里来锻炼。

sentences.chinese: 这两个城市之间的距离大约是200英里。

sentences.chinese: 这辆车的燃油里程非常高。

sentences.chinese: 他为他的商务旅行计算了里程数。

sentences.chinese: 她每天早上喝一杯牛奶。

sentences.chinese: 这种奶酪是由牛奶制成的。

sentences.chinese: 宝宝需要牛奶才能健康成长。
