sentences.english: I need to get some sleep before the meeting tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我需要在明天会议前睡个好觉。

sentences.english: Sleep deprivation can affect your mood and cognitive performance.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠不足会影响你的情绪和认知表现。

sentences.english: She always has a hard time falling asleep.
sentences.chinese: 她总是很难入睡。

detailed_translations.english: the state of not being awake
to rest in a state of physical and mental inactivity

sentences.english: She was fast asleep when I arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我到的时候她正睡得很沉。

sentences.english: The baby is sleeping in the cradle.
sentences.chinese: 宝宝在摇篮里睡觉。

sentences.english: Make sure the baby is sleeping safely.
sentences.chinese: 确保宝宝睡得安全。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a state of rest in which the eyes are closed and consciousness is reduced

sentences.english: He accidentally slipped on the ice and fell down.
sentences.chinese: 他不小心在冰上滑倒了。

sentences.english: The thief slipped into the house through the window.
sentences.chinese: 小偷从窗户偷偷溜进了房子。

sentences.english: Make sure to slip the key into the lock carefully.
sentences.chinese: 确保小心地将钥匙插入锁中。

detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly along a surface while maintaining contact with it
to put or push something into a particular place or position
a small piece of paper with a message on it

sentences.english: I can smell something burning in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我闻到厨房里有东西烧焦了。

sentences.english: The flowers smell wonderful.
sentences.chinese: 这些花闻起来很香。

sentences.english: He has a keen sense of smell.
sentences.chinese: 他嗅觉很灵敏。

detailed_translations.english: the faculty that enables us to perceive odors
to detect or perceive the presence of (something) by the sense of smell

sentences.english: He smoke a cigarette while he was waiting for the bus.
sentences.chinese: 他在等公交车的时候抽了一根烟。

sentences.english: The smell of smoke filled the room.
sentences.chinese: 烟味充满了整个房间。

sentences.english: Many countries are working to reduce smoke pollution.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家正在努力减少烟雾污染。

detailed_translations.english: the particulate matter drawn into the lungs by smoking
to inhale and exhale the fumes of burning tobacco

sentences.english: He put out a cigarette and looked at the smoking area.
sentences.chinese: 他掐灭了香烟，看向吸烟区。

sentences.english: Smoking is prohibited in this building.
sentences.chinese: 这座建筑内禁止吸烟。

sentences.english: She has been smoking for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 她已经吸烟十年了。

detailed_translations.english: the act of inhaling and exhaling the smoke of burning tobacco
smoking (cigarettes, pipes, etc.)

sentences.english: I usually have a snack between meals.
sentences.chinese: 我通常在饭点之间吃点零食。

sentences.english: The children loved the snack bar at the mall.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们很喜欢购物中心里的零食吧。

sentences.english: This granola bar is a great snack for hiking.
sentences.chinese: 这种燕麦棒是远足的绝佳零食。

detailed_translations.english: a small amount of food eaten between meals
to eat a small amount of food between meals

sentences.english: The rich soil is perfect for growing vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 肥沃的土壤非常适合种植蔬菜。

sentences.english: Heavy rain can cause the soil to erode.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨可能导致土壤侵蚀。

sentences.english: Farmers need to take care of their soil to ensure good harvests.
sentences.chinese: 农民需要照顾好他们的土壤以确保好的收成。

detailed_translations.english: the ground, especially the loose top layer, in which plants grow

sentences.english: We need to find a solution to this problem quickly.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要迅速找到这个问题的解决方案。

sentences.english: The chemist developed a solution to remove the stain.
sentences.chinese: 化学家开发了一种去除污渍的溶液。

sentences.english: The company offered a solution to improve customer satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 公司提供了一种提高客户满意度的解决方案。

detailed_translations.english: a means of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation
a liquid mixture in which one substance is dissolved in another

sentences.english: The sound of the rain was soothing.
sentences.chinese: 雨声让人感到舒缓。

sentences.english: Please turn down the sound on your phone.
sentences.chinese: 请把你的手机音量调小。

sentences.english: This old radio doesn't pick up the sound very well.
sentences.chinese: 这台旧收音机收音效果不太好。

detailed_translations.english: the sensation produced by vibrating objects; the sense by which vibrations in the air or other medium are perceived by the ear
to make a noise or sound

sentences.english: The source of the river is in the high mountains.
sentences.chinese: 这条河的源头在高山上。

sentences.english: We need to find a reliable source for this information.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要找到这个信息的可靠来源。

sentences.english: This painting is inspired by a source from classical mythology.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画受到了古典神话中一个来源的启发。

detailed_translations.english: the place, person, or thing from which something originates or can be traced back

detailed_translations.chinese: （文学作品、艺术作品的）灵感来源
detailed_translations.english: a person or thing that inspires an artist or writer
a person or organization that provides information or data

sentences.english: They moved to the south of the city to enjoy a quieter life.
sentences.chinese: 他们搬到了城市南部，以享受更宁静的生活。

sentences.english: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
sentences.chinese: 太阳从东方升起，从西方落下。

sentences.english: She spent her childhood in the southern part of the country.
sentences.chinese: 她童年在国家的南部度过。

detailed_translations.english: the region to the south of a place or country
relating to the south
in or towards the south

sentences.english: They decided to move to a city in the southeast of the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定搬到该国东南部的城市。

sentences.english: The southeast wind brought warm air from the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 东南风把温暖的空气从海洋带来了。

sentences.english: Southeast Asia is known for its rich cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 东南亚以其丰富的文化遗产而闻名。

detailed_translations.chinese: 东南的； 来自东南的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or coming from the direction of southeast
the direction or region towards the southeast

sentences.english: We drove for hours through the southwest desert.
sentences.chinese: 我们开车数小时穿过了西南部的沙漠。

sentences.english: The city is known for its beautiful southwest landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市以其美丽的西南部风光而闻名。

detailed_translations.chinese: 西南部的；来自西南部的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or coming from the southwest

sentences.english: The vastness of space is often a topic of fascination for many people.
sentences.chinese: 浩瀚的太空常常是许多人着迷的话题。

sentences.english: Astronauts explore the mysteries of space.
sentences.chinese: 宇航员探索太空的奥秘。

sentences.english: Space travel has come a long way since the first satellite was launched.
sentences.chinese: 自从第一颗卫星发射以来，太空旅行已经取得了长足的进步。

detailed_translations.english: the region of the universe beyond the Earth's atmosphere
a period of time during which something exists or happens

sentences.english: She is the main speaker at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 她是这次会议的主要发言人。

sentences.english: The speaker system provides high-quality sound.
sentences.chinese: 扬声器系统提供高质量的音效。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发言人； 扬声器； 演讲者
detailed_translations.english: a person who speaks in public or at an event

sentences.english: She is fluent in speaking three languages.
sentences.chinese: 她能流利地说三种语言。

sentences.english: He was born speaking Spanish, but he learned English at school.
sentences.chinese: 他出生时就会说西班牙语，但在学校里学会了英语。

sentences.english: The teacher asked the students to stop speaking during the test.
sentences.chinese: 老师让学生在考试时不要说话。

detailed_translations.english: to use your mouth to make sounds that form words or sentences

sentences.english: He increased the speed of his car to beat the traffic.
sentences.chinese: 他加快了汽车的速度以避开交通拥堵。

sentences.english: The speed of light is constant in a vacuum.
sentences.chinese: 光在真空中的速度是恒定的。

sentences.english: She finished the race at high speed.
sentences.chinese: 她以高速完成了比赛。

detailed_translations.english: the rate at which something moves, travels, or happens
to cause something to move or happen more quickly

sentences.english: We need to cut back on our spending to save money.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要削减开支以节省金钱。

sentences.english: Her spending habits are quite reckless.
sentences.chinese: 她的消费习惯相当鲁莽。

sentences.english: The company is reducing its capital spending.
sentences.chinese: 公司正在减少其资本支出。

detailed_translations.english: the act of spending or consuming money or other resources for a purpose

sentences.english: The spider spun a web to catch its prey.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛结网捕食。

sentences.english: Some people are afraid of spiders.
sentences.chinese: 有些人害怕蜘蛛。

sentences.english: Spiders are known for their ability to spin silk.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛以其能够吐丝结网的能力而闻名。

detailed_translations.english: an arthropod with eight legs that usually makes a web to catch insects

sentences.english: She sponsored the young artist's first exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 她资助了这位年轻艺术家的首次展览。

sentences.english: The company sponsored a charity run to raise funds for cancer research.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司赞助了一场慈善跑，为癌症研究筹集资金。

sentences.english: He sponsored the bill in the parliament.
sentences.chinese: 他在议会中赞助了这项法案。

detailed_translations.english: to support a person, organization, or event financially

sentences.english: We need more spoons for the party.
sentences.chinese: 我们为聚会需要更多的勺子。

sentences.english: She ate the soup with a spoon.
sentences.chinese: 她用勺子喝汤。

sentences.english: He dropped the spoon on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他把勺子掉在了地上。

detailed_translations.english: a utensil used for eating or serving food, typically with a handle and a shallow bowl-shaped bowl

sentences.english: He is a remarkable sportsman who always maintains a positive attitude.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位杰出的运动员，始终保持积极的态度。

sentences.english: The sportsman won the gold medal in the 100 meters race.
sentences.chinese: 这位运动员在100米比赛中获得了金牌。

sentences.english: She is a talented sportswoman who excels in tennis.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位有天赋的体育女将，在网球方面表现出色。

detailed_translations.english: a man who plays sports, especially professionally

sentences.english: I saw a spot of ink on the white shirt.
sentences.chinese: 我在白衬衫上看到一个小墨点。

sentences.english: She found a great spot for a picnic in the park.
sentences.chinese: 她在公园里找到一个非常适合野餐的好地方。

sentences.english: The teacher spotted the student cheating on the exam.
sentences.chinese: 老师 spotted 学生在考试中作弊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地点；地点；地点；斑点；污点
detailed_translations.english: a particular place or area
a small mark or stain of a different color
to notice or identify something or someone, especially after a careful search

sentences.english: The stability of the economy is crucial for sustainable growth.
sentences.chinese: 经济的稳定性对可持续发展至关重要。

sentences.english: We need to ensure the stability of the project's funding.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要确保项目的资金稳定。

sentences.english: His stability in the face of adversity was truly impressive.
sentences.chinese: 他在逆境面前的稳定表现真正令人印象深刻。

detailed_translations.english: the quality or state of being firm, secure, and not easily changed or moved

sentences.english: We need to stack these boxes carefully to ensure they don't fall over.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要小心地将这些箱子堆叠起来，以确保它们不会倒塌。

sentences.english: The chef stacked the plates with precision.
sentences.chinese: 厨师精确地堆叠着盘子。

sentences.english: They decided to stack the books vertically to save space.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定垂直堆放书籍以节省空间。

detailed_translations.english: a pile of things stacked on top of each other
to put things on top of each other in a pile

sentences.english: The play will be staged next month at the local theatre.
sentences.chinese: 这部剧将在下个月在当地剧院上演。

sentences.english: She has been on stage many times in her career.
sentences.chinese: 她在职业生涯中已经在舞台上表演过很多次了。

sentences.english: The meeting was moved to a later stage.
sentences.chinese: 会议被移到了后期阶段。

detailed_translations.english: a raised platform where a performance or speech is given

detailed_translations.chinese: 上演；策划；使进入某个阶段
detailed_translations.english: to produce (a play, film, or other performance) for presentation to an audience

sentences.english: She carefully climbed the stairs to the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 她小心翼翼地爬上楼梯到了二楼。

sentences.english: The house has a grand staircase leading to the main hall.
sentences.chinese: 这栋房子有一座宏伟的楼梯通向主厅。

sentences.english: They installed a new set of stairs last week.
sentences.chinese: 他们上周安装了一套新的楼梯。

detailed_translations.english: a set of steps leading from one level to another

sentences.english: This product meets the industry standard for quality.
sentences.chinese: 这款产品符合行业质量标准。

sentences.english: We need to set a standard for behavior in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要在教室里设定行为标准。

sentences.english: Her performance was well above standard expectations.
sentences.chinese: 她的表现远超标准预期。

detailed_translations.english: a level or type of quality or achievement that is considered normal or expected
conforming to a standard; usual or normal
to bring something to a standard level

sentences.english: The stars shine brightly in the night sky.
sentences.chinese: 星星在夜空中明亮地闪耀。

sentences.english: She is a star performer in her field.
sentences.chinese: 她是她所在领域的明星。

sentences.english: We watched the meteor shower and the stars twinkling above.
sentences.chinese: 我们观看了流星雨和头顶闪烁的星星。

detailed_translations.english: a very bright point of light in the night sky that is a planet, a star, or a galaxy
a famous or successful person, especially in entertainment or sports
to make someone or something famous or well-known

sentences.english: We need a good starter to kick off the project.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个好的启动者来启动这个项目。

sentences.english: The starter recipe is very simple and quick to make.
sentences.chinese: 这个开胃菜的食谱非常简单，制作起来也很快速。

sentences.english: Every team has a starter player who plays in the first match.
sentences.chinese: 每个队都有一个首发球员，在第一场比赛中上场。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发起人； 开胃菜； 首发球员
detailed_translations.english: a person who begins something or a dish served before the main course
relating to or occurring at the beginning

sentences.english: Starting a new business can be both exciting and challenging.
sentences.chinese: 创办一家新企业既令人兴奋又充满挑战。

sentences.english: She is starting her career as a software developer.
sentences.chinese: 她开始她的职业生涯成为一名软件开发者。

sentences.english: The race will start at 9 a.m. tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 比赛将于明天上午9点开始。

detailed_translations.english: to begin doing something or using something

sentences.english: The state of the economy is a major concern for the government.
sentences.chinese: 经济状况是政府的主要关注点。

sentences.english: She was in a good state of health when she started the marathon.
sentences.chinese: 她开始马拉松时身体状况良好。

sentences.english: The state of the environment is deteriorating due to pollution.
sentences.chinese: 由于污染，环境状况正在恶化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 国家； 州； 状态； 情况
detailed_translations.english: a political community with a governing head and established laws
the condition of something in a particular period in time
to express or state something clearly

sentences.english: The company issued a formal statement regarding the incident.
sentences.chinese: 公司就此事发布了一份正式声明。

sentences.english: Please provide a clear statement of your intentions.
sentences.chinese: 请清楚地说明你的意图。

sentences.english: The financial statement shows a significant increase in revenue.
sentences.chinese: 财务报表显示收入大幅增长。

detailed_translations.english: a formal account or statement of facts or beliefs

sentences.english: The train station is located at the end of the street.
sentences.chinese: 火车站位于街道的尽头。

sentences.english: She works at the local station as a journalist.
sentences.chinese: 她当地的一个电视台担任记者。

sentences.english: The station is equipped with modern facilities.
sentences.chinese: 这个站点配备了现代化的设施。

detailed_translations.english: a place where vehicles regularly stop to load or unload passengers or goods
a place from which broadcasts are sent out

sentences.english: The status of the project is currently 'ongoing'.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目的状态目前是'进行中'。

sentences.english: Her social status improved significantly after she was elected president.
sentences.chinese: 她当选总统后，社会地位显著提高。

sentences.english: The device needs to be updated to the latest status.
sentences.chinese: 该设备需要更新到最新状态。

detailed_translations.english: the condition of someone or something at a particular time

sentences.english: I love to have a juicy steak for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢晚餐吃一块多汁的牛排。

sentences.english: The chef prepared a perfect medium-rare steak.
sentences.chinese: 大厨准备了一块完美的五分熟牛排。

sentences.english: He cooked the steak on the grill for about 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 他在烧烤架上烤了大约10分钟的牛排。

detailed_translations.english: a thick slice of meat, especially beef, cut from the side of the animal and cooked

sentences.english: The steam engine was a key innovation during the Industrial Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽机是工业革命期间的一项关键创新。

sentences.english: We watched the steam rise from the hot cup of tea.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着热茶中升起的蒸汽。

sentences.english: The ship uses steam power to move forward.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船使用蒸汽动力向前移动。

detailed_translations.english: the visible vapor given off by boiling water or other liquids
a vessel propelled by steam power
a feeling of enthusiasm or excitement

detailed_translations.chinese: 用蒸汽加热；用蒸汽处理
detailed_translations.english: to heat something with steam
to emit steam

sentences.english: He took a step towards the door.
sentences.chinese: 他向门口迈了一步。

sentences.english: We need to take steps to reduce pollution.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要采取措施减少污染。

sentences.english: She improved her skills with steady steps.
sentences.chinese: 她通过稳步的努力提升了技能。

detailed_translations.english: a literal step or a part of a staircase
an action or procedure that is part of a process or larger plan
progress or development
to move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn
to take action or make a change

sentences.english: The bee quickly stung the intruder.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂迅速蜇了入侵者。

sentences.english: He felt a sharp sting where the insect had bitten him.
sentences.chinese: 他在被昆虫叮咬的地方感到一阵刺痛。

sentences.english: The political scandal really stung the party in the election.
sentences.chinese: 这次政治丑闻在选举中狠狠地打击了该党。

detailed_translations.english: to cause a sharp, painful sensation on the skin, typically with a pointed part of the body
a sharp, painful sensation caused by a pointed part of the body, such as a bee or wasp

sentences.english: We need to stock up on groceries before the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要在周末前储备一些食品杂货。

sentences.english: The warehouse is full of stock.
sentences.chinese: 仓库里堆满了库存。

sentences.english: The company's stock price has increased by 10% today.
sentences.chinese: 该公司今天的股价上涨了10%。

detailed_translations.english: the goods or materials kept by a shop, factory, etc. for sale or use
shares in a company
to put goods into storage for future use

sentences.english: I have a stomach ache.
sentences.chinese: 我胃疼。

sentences.english: She eats a lot of spicy food, which often upsets her stomach.
sentences.chinese: 她吃很多辣的东西，这经常让她胃不舒服。

sentences.english: He has a sensitive stomach.
sentences.chinese: 他的胃很敏感。

detailed_translations.english: the organ in the body that helps to digest food

sentences.english: He has a bad stomachache after eating too much junk food.
sentences.chinese: 他吃了太多垃圾食品后胃疼得厉害。

sentences.english: I couldn't concentrate on my work because of the stomachache.
sentences.chinese: 因为胃痛，我无法集中精力工作。

sentences.english: She drank some hot tea to relieve her stomachache.
sentences.chinese: 她喝了一些热茶来缓解胃痛。

detailed_translations.english: pain in the stomach area

sentences.english: The old stone bridge over the river has stood for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 河上的这座古老石桥已经屹立了几个世纪。

sentences.english: She decided to carve a statue out of the block of stone.
sentences.chinese: 她决定从这块石头上雕刻出一座雕像。

sentences.english: The weathered stone walls of the castle are a reminder of its history.
sentences.chinese: 城堡风化的石墙是它历史的见证。

detailed_translations.chinese: 石头； 石块； 石材
detailed_translations.english: a piece of hard rock shaped by nature or people
a solid piece of mineral matter that is typically hard, crystalline, and formed by geological processes

sentences.english: I need to go to the store to buy some milk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要去商店买一些牛奶。

sentences.english: They have a variety of items stored in the warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 他们在仓库里储存了各种各样的物品。

sentences.english: The online store offers a wide range of products.
sentences.chinese: 这家在线商店提供各种产品。

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are kept for sale to the public
to put something away in a place for safekeeping or future use
to keep something in storage

sentences.english: She loves to tell stories to the children.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢给孩子们讲故事。

sentences.english: This book tells a story about a brave knight.
sentences.chinese: 这本书讲述了一个勇敢的骑士的故事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 故事； 传说； 经历
detailed_translations.english: a sequence of related events or experiences, typically in the form of a narrative

sentences.english: Our overall strategy for market expansion involves opening new stores in key cities.
sentences.chinese: 我们市场扩张的总体战略包括在主要城市开设新店。

sentences.english: The company's strategy to increase profitability is to reduce costs and improve efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 公司提高盈利能力的战略是降低成本和提高效率。

sentences.english: Developing a sound strategy is crucial for the success of any project.
sentences.chinese: 制定一个合理的战略对于任何项目的成功至关重要。

detailed_translations.english: a plan of action or policy designed to achieve a major or overall aim

sentences.english: She has the strength to overcome any challenge.
sentences.chinese: 她有克服任何挑战的力量。

sentences.english: The strength of the team lies in its diversity.
sentences.chinese: 团队的力量在于其多样性。

sentences.english: This medicine will strengthen your immune system.
sentences.chinese: 这种药物将增强你的免疫系统。

detailed_translations.english: the quality or state of being physically strong
an advantage or ability that helps you to be successful or cope with difficult situations
the amount of force that something can withstand or the force that something exerts

sentences.english: The workers went on strike to demand better pay.
sentences.chinese: 工人们举行罢工以要求更好的工资。

sentences.english: The baseball player struck out three times in the game.
sentences.chinese: 这位棒球选手在比赛中三振出局。

sentences.english: He struck a match and lit the fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 他划了根火柴，点燃了壁炉。

sentences.english: The news of the strike caused panic in the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 罢工的消息在股市中引起了恐慌。

sentences.english: She struck up a conversation with the stranger at the party.
sentences.chinese: 她在派对上与陌生人搭话。

detailed_translations.chinese: 罢工；击中；突然想起；激起
detailed_translations.english: to stop working as a group in order to protest
to hit something or someone
to suddenly remember something
to cause a strong feeling or reaction

sentences.english: Her writing style is both elegant and concise.
sentences.chinese: 她的写作风格既优雅又简洁。

sentences.english: The interior design of the house follows a modern style.
sentences.chinese: 这栋房子的内部设计遵循现代风格。

sentences.english: He has a distinctive fashion style that sets him apart from others.
sentences.chinese: 他有着独特的时尚风格，使他与众不同。

detailed_translations.english: a particular way of doing or presenting something that is typical of a particular person, group, or period
to give something a particular style or design

sentences.english: The main subject of the painting is a landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画的主要主题是风景。

sentences.english: She chose history as her favorite subject in school.
sentences.chinese: 她在学校选择了历史作为她最喜欢的科目。

detailed_translations.english: a subject that you are studying or thinking about
a person who is ruled by a king or queen

sentences.english: She drizzled some maple syrup over her pancakes.
sentences.chinese: 她在煎饼上淋了一些枫糖浆。

sentences.english: The recipe requires a cup of corn syrup.
sentences.chinese: 这个食谱需要一杯玉米糖浆。

sentences.english: He has a sweet tooth and loves to drink fruit syrup.
sentences.chinese: 他是个甜食爱好者，喜欢喝水果糖浆。

detailed_translations.english: a thick sweet liquid used especially in cooking or as a drink

sentences.english: The government provides subsidies to farmers to support agricultural production.
sentences.chinese: 政府向农民提供补贴以支持农业生产。

sentences.english: Subsidies can help reduce the cost of public transportation for commuters.
sentences.chinese: 补贴可以帮助降低通勤者的公共交通成本。

sentences.english: Many industries rely on government subsidies to stay competitive.
sentences.chinese: 许多行业依赖政府补贴以保持竞争力。

detailed_translations.english: financial assistance given by the government to reduce costs or encourage development

sentences.english: Many people choose to live in the suburbs for a quieter lifestyle.
sentences.chinese: 许多人选择住在郊区，以获得更宁静的生活。

sentences.english: The city has expanded rapidly,吞并了周边的许多郊区。
sentences.chinese: 这座城市发展迅速，吞并了周边的许多郊区。

detailed_translations.english: an area on the edge of a town or city

sentences.english: She added sugar to her coffee to make it sweeter.
sentences.chinese: 她在咖啡里加糖让它变得更甜。

sentences.english: Sugar is a common ingredient in many desserts.
sentences.chinese: 糖是许多甜点中常见的成分。

sentences.english: Excessive sugar consumption is not good for health.
sentences.chinese: 过量摄入糖分对健康不利。

detailed_translations.english: a white substance used to sweeten food and drinks, made from sugar cane or sugar beet

sentences.english: This suit looks great on you.
sentences.chinese: 这套西装穿在你身上看起来很好。

sentences.english: He wore a formal suit to the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一套正式的西装去参加了婚礼。

sentences.english: She needs to go to the tailor to get her suit altered.
sentences.chinese: 她需要去裁缝店修改她的西装。

detailed_translations.english: a set of clothes consisting of a jacket and trousers or a skirt, usually worn for formal or smart occasions

detailed_translations.chinese: （尤指工作或社交场合穿的）一套衣服
detailed_translations.english: a set of clothes worn together, typically a jacket and trousers or a jacket and skirt
to make something suitable or appropriate for a particular purpose or situation

sentences.english: The space station is equipped with a solar shield to protect it from the sun's radiation.
sentences.chinese: 太空站配备了太阳盾以保护它免受太阳辐射。

sentences.english: A sunshield is a crucial component of a spacecraft designed to block sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 太阳盾是太空船的一个关键部件，设计用来阻挡阳光。

detailed_translations.english: a device or structure designed to block or reduce the amount of sunlight reaching a surface

sentences.english: The project supervisor is responsible for overseeing the team's progress.
sentences.chinese: 项目负责人负责监督团队的工作进展。

sentences.english: She has been the supervisor of the internship program for over five years.
sentences.chinese: 她担任实习项目的负责人已经超过五年了。

sentences.english: Every employee should report any issues to their supervisor immediately.
sentences.chinese: 每位员工都应该立即向他们的主管报告任何问题。

detailed_translations.english: a person who supervises or manages other people

sentences.english: The government provides support to those affected by the disaster.
sentences.chinese: 政府为受灾害影响的人提供支持。

sentences.english: This chair offers good support for your back.
sentences.chinese: 这张椅子对你的背部提供了良好的支撑。

sentences.english: We need to support each other to achieve our goals.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要互相支持以实现我们的目标。

detailed_translations.english: to give help, encouragement, or approval to someone or something

sentences.english: The surface of the planet is mostly covered with water.
sentences.chinese: 这个行星的表面大部分被水覆盖。

sentences.english: She smoothed the surface of the table before placing the vase on it.
sentences.chinese: 她在把花瓶放在桌子上之前，把桌面的表面弄平整了。

sentences.english: The painting had a rough surface texture.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画的表面纹理很粗糙。

detailed_translations.english: the outside part or uppermost layer of something
to make the surface of something smooth or even

sentences.english: The surgeon performed the operation with great skill.
sentences.chinese: 这位外科医生以高超的技巧完成了手术。

sentences.english: She dreams of becoming a brain surgeon.
sentences.chinese: 她梦想成为一名脑外科医生。

sentences.english: The surgeon examined the patient carefully.
sentences.chinese: 外科医生仔细检查了病人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外科医生；外科手术医生

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of hard material used for covering roofs, walls, or floors
to cover a surface with tiles

sentences.english: They used timber to build the house.
sentences.chinese: 他们用木材建造了房子。

sentences.english: The forest is rich in timber.
sentences.chinese: 这片森林富含木材。

sentences.english: The ship was constructed from timber.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船是由木材建造的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 木材； 原木； 木料
detailed_translations.english: wood that has been cut and prepared for use in building or making things

sentences.english: Time flies when you're having fun.
sentences.chinese: 快乐时光飞逝。

sentences.english: We don't have enough time to finish this project.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有足够的时间来完成这个项目。

sentences.english: The best time to plant a tree was twenty years ago. The second best time is now.
sentences.chinese: 种树最好的时间是二十年前，其次是现在。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time; a specific moment
to record the time taken to do something

sentences.english: The book has a captivating title that grabs the reader's attention.
sentences.chinese: 这本书有一个引人入胜的书名，吸引了读者的注意力。

sentences.english: She officially received her title as the CEO of the company.
sentences.chinese: 她正式获得了公司CEO的头衔。

sentences.english: The movie's title is a play on words that adds to its humor.
sentences.chinese: 电影的名字是一个文字游戏，增加了它的幽默感。

detailed_translations.english: the name of a book, article, movie, etc.

sentences.english: She put the bread in the toaster to make it crispy.
sentences.chinese: 她把面包放进烤面包机里让它变得脆一点。

sentences.english: The old toaster still works, even though it's over ten years old.
sentences.chinese: 这台烤面包机虽然已经用了超过十年，但仍然能正常工作。

sentences.english: He forgot to take the toast out of the toaster in time and it got burnt.
sentences.chinese: 他没及时把吐司从烤面包机里拿出来，结果烤焦了。

detailed_translations.english: an electrical device for toasting bread

sentences.english: Please make sure to flush the toilet after use.
sentences.chinese: 请使用后确保冲水马桶。

sentences.english: The hotel has clean and well-maintained public toilets.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店有干净且维护良好的公共厕所。

sentences.english: He went into the bathroom to use the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 他走进浴室去上厕所。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building containing a toilet and often a sink
a device for flushing water to carry waste away from a toilet

sentences.english: I love to eat tomato in salad.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在沙拉中吃番茄。

sentences.english: The tomato sauce is very delicious.
sentences.chinese: 番茄酱非常美味。

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit used in cooking, typically red when ripe

sentences.english: The tone of the letter was formal and respectful.
sentences.chinese: 这封信的语气正式而尊敬。

sentences.english: She changed her tone when she saw how upset he was.
sentences.chinese: 当她看到他有多生气时，她的语气变了。

sentences.english: The teacher used a firm tone to discipline the students.
sentences.chinese: 老师用严厉的语气来管教学生。

detailed_translations.chinese: 语调； 语气； 色调； 风格
detailed_translations.english: the way in which something is said or written, reflecting a person's feelings or attitude
to adjust the pitch of (a musical note or instrument)

sentences.english: We need a variety of tools for this construction project.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要各种各样的工具来完成这个建筑项目。

sentences.english: She is a skilled craftsperson who uses tools with precision.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位熟练的手工艺人，使用工具非常精准。

sentences.english: This software is a powerful tool for data analysis.
sentences.chinese: 这款软件是数据分析的强大工具。

detailed_translations.english: an implement used in the practice of a vocation or trade; a device or instrument for accomplishing a particular function

sentences.english: She always tries to be on top of her game.
sentences.chinese: 她总是努力保持在自己的领域里领先。

sentences.english: The mountain peak is the highest point top.
sentences.chinese: 山峰是最高点。

sentences.english: His performance at the conference was top-notch.
sentences.chinese: 他在会议上的表现非常出色。

detailed_translations.english: highest in position or rank
at, to, or toward a higher position

sentences.english: This topic is very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 这个话题非常有趣。

sentences.english: Can you change the topic?
sentences.chinese: 你能换个话题吗？

sentences.english: What is the main topic of this article?
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章的主要话题是什么？

detailed_translations.english: a subject that is being discussed or written about

sentences.english: The total number of students in the class is 50.
sentences.chinese: 这个班级的总学生人数是50人。

sentences.english: We need to calculate the total cost of the project.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要计算这个项目的总成本。

sentences.english: Her total income for the year was $60,000.
sentences.chinese: 她一年的总收入是60,000美元。

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全的； 总体的； 全部的
detailed_translations.english: completely; overall; entire
the whole amount or number
completely; entirely

sentences.english: Her touching story moved everyone in the room.
sentences.chinese: 她感人的故事让房间里的每个人都感动了。

sentences.english: The touching performance received a standing ovation.
sentences.chinese: 感人的表演赢得了观众起立鼓掌。

detailed_translations.english: causing someone to feel sympathy or sadness

sentences.english: We took a guided tour of the museum.
sentences.chinese: 我们参加了一个导游的博物馆之旅。

sentences.english: The travel agency offers tours to various historical sites.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅行社提供前往不同历史遗迹的旅游线路。

sentences.english: She is planning a round-the-world tour.
sentences.chinese: 她正在计划一次环球旅行。

detailed_translations.english: a trip to a place for pleasure, education, or inspection
a series of places that are visited during a trip
to visit a number of places

sentences.english: The band is planning a worldwide touring schedule to promote their new album.
sentences.chinese: 乐队正在计划一个全球巡演日程来推广他们的新专辑。

sentences.english: She enjoys touring with her band, as it allows her to meet fans from different countries.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢和她的乐队巡演，因为这让她能够接触到来自不同国家的粉丝。

sentences.english: The museum offers a special touring experience with guided tours in multiple languages.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆提供一种特殊的巡演体验，包括多种语言的导游服务。

detailed_translations.english: a trip made to visit various places, especially for entertainment or sightseeing

sentences.english: Tourism is a major source of revenue for many countries.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业是许多国家的主要收入来源。

sentences.english: The tourism industry includes hotels, restaurants, and travel agencies.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业包括酒店、餐馆和旅行社。

sentences.english: Many people travel for tourism purposes each year.
sentences.chinese: 每年都有许多人出于旅游目的而旅行。

detailed_translations.english: the business of providing services to tourists

sentences.english: We received a large number of tourists during the holiday season.
sentences.chinese: 在假期期间，我们接待了大量游客。

sentences.english: Many tourists visit the Eiffel Tower every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年都有许多游客参观埃菲尔铁塔。

sentences.english: The tourist guide provided detailed information about the historical sites.
sentences.chinese: 导游提供了关于历史遗址的详细信息。

detailed_translations.english: a person who travels around an area for pleasure

sentences.english: She dried her face with a soft towel.
sentences.chinese: 她用一条柔软的毛巾擦干脸。

sentences.english: Please bring me a clean towel.
sentences.chinese: 请给我拿一条干净的毛巾。

sentences.english: The beach towels were spread out on the sand.
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上铺着海滩毛巾。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth used for drying the body or something wet

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是巴黎的一个著名地标。

sentences.english: The tower offers a panoramic view of the city.
sentences.chinese: 这座塔提供了俯瞰整个城市的全景。

sentences.english: They climbed to the top of the tower for a better perspective.
sentences.chinese: 他们爬到塔顶以获得更好的视角。

detailed_translations.english: a tall building or structure

sentences.english: She grew up in a small town in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 她在一个乡村小镇长大。

sentences.english: The town square is the center of community life.
sentences.chinese: 小镇广场是社区生活的中心。

sentences.english: We visited a historic town known for its beautiful architecture.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了一个以美丽建筑而闻名的历史小镇。

detailed_translations.english: a place smaller than a city, typically having a local government and a small population

sentences.english: The train is now on the right track.
sentences.chinese: 火车现在在正确的轨道上。

sentences.english: She has been tracking her progress carefully.
sentences.chinese: 她一直仔细地跟踪她的进度。

sentences.english: We need to stay on track to meet the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要保持轨道以赶上截止日期。

detailed_translations.english: a line or route followed by a moving object

sentences.english: The farmer drove the tractor across the field to plant the crops.
sentences.chinese: 农民开着拖拉机穿过田野来种植庄稼。

sentences.english: We need a new tractor for the construction work.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一台新的拖拉机来完成这项建设工作。

sentences.english: The old tractor still runs well despite its age.
sentences.chinese: 尽管很旧，这台旧拖拉机仍然运行良好。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with large wheels for pulling agricultural machinery or carrying heavy loads

sentences.english: Trade between countries has increased significantly over the past decade.
sentences.chinese: 过去十年间，国家间的贸易显著增加。

sentences.english: He decided to trade his old car for a new one.
sentences.chinese: 他决定用他的旧车换一辆新车。

sentences.english: The company is looking for new markets to trade with.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正在寻找新的贸易市场。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of buying and selling goods or services

sentences.english: I took the tram to the city center.
sentences.chinese: 我乘电车去了市中心。

sentences.english: The tram stopped at every stop, allowing passengers to get on and off easily.
sentences.chinese: 电车在每个站点都停，方便乘客上下车。

sentences.english: The old tram line has been replaced with a new, more modern one.
sentences.chinese: 老旧的电车线路已被一条更现代的新线路取代。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that runs on tracks and is pulled by a cable

sentences.english: The play depicted a tragic family tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 这部戏剧描绘了一个悲惨的家庭悲剧。

sentences.english: The accident was a terrible tragedy that changed many lives forever.
sentences.chinese: 这场事故是一场可怕的悲剧，永远改变了许多人的人生。

sentences.english: In literature, tragedy often explores themes of fate and human suffering.
sentences.chinese: 在文学中，悲剧经常探讨命运和人类苦难的主题。

sentences.chinese: 电影预告片很好地预览了激动人心的情节。

sentences.english: We attached a trailer to the truck to transport the furniture.
sentences.chinese: 我们把拖车连接到卡车上来运输家具。

sentences.english: He is undergoing intensive training to become a pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他正在接受密集训练以成为一名飞行员。

sentences.english: The company provides ongoing training for its employees.
sentences.chinese: 该公司为其员工提供持续的培训。

sentences.english: She has completed her training as a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 她已完成她的护士培训。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of someone being taught a skill or job

sentences.english: The global market trend is showing an upward trajectory.
sentences.chinese: 全球市场趋势显示出上升的轨迹。

sentences.english: We need to identify the current trend in customer preferences.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要识别当前客户偏好的趋势。

sentences.english: This fashion trend has been popular for the past few seasons.
sentences.chinese: 这种时尚趋势在过去几个季度都很流行。

detailed_translations.english: a general direction in which something is developing or changing

sentences.english: I love to travel and explore new cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢旅行和探索新的文化。

sentences.english: They decided to travel around the world after retiring.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定退休后环游世界。

sentences.english: Travel can broaden your horizons and make you more knowledgeable.
sentences.chinese: 旅行可以开阔你的视野，让你更加博学。

detailed_translations.english: to go from one place to another, typically over a distance

sentences.english: The traveler easily adjusted to the new culture.
sentences.chinese: 这位旅行者很容易适应了新的文化。

sentences.english: She is a seasoned traveler, having visited over 50 countries.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位经验丰富的旅行者，已经访问过50多个国家。

detailed_translations.english: a person who travels, especially over a long distance or for pleasure

sentences.english: The treatment of patients should always be compassionate.
sentences.chinese: 对待病人应该始终充满同情。

sentences.english: This product comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 这款产品提供30天退款保证。

sentences.english: She received special treatment for her injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她因伤接受了特殊治疗。

detailed_translations.english: the action or process of treating someone or something

to deal with something or someone in a particular way

sentences.english: We took a trip to the mountains last summer.
sentences.chinese: 去年夏天我们去了山区旅行。

sentences.english: The trip was longer than we expected.
sentences.chinese: 这次旅行比我们预期的要长。

sentences.english: She decided to extend her trip by one day.
sentences.chinese: 她决定把她的旅行延长一天。

detailed_translations.english: a journey or trip made for a specific purpose or to a particular place

sentences.english: The Maasai tribe is known for its vibrant cultural traditions.
sentences.chinese: 马赛部落以其丰富多彩的文化传统而闻名。

sentences.english: The tribe gathered around the fire to share stories.
sentences.chinese: 部落的人们围坐在篝火旁分享故事。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people related by blood or marriage who share a common culture and religion

sentences.english: They paid a heavy tribute to the bravery of the soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 他们高度赞扬了士兵们的勇敢。

sentences.english: This ancient city is a tribute to the rich cultural heritage of the region.
sentences.chinese: 这座古城是该地区丰富文化遗产的见证。

sentences.english: The artist's work is a tribute to the beauty of nature.
sentences.chinese: 艺术家的作品是对自然之美的赞颂。

detailed_translations.english: something given or offered voluntarily as an expression of respect, gratitude, or honor

sentences.english: The king received tributes from all over the empire.
sentences.chinese: 国王从帝国各地收到了贡品。

sentences.english: They paid annual tributes to the local deity.
sentences.chinese: 他们每年都要向当地神灵献上贡品。

detailed_translations.english: something offered to someone in authority as a sign of respect or gratitude; a payment or gift made to an authority figure

sentences.english: The Trinity College Dublin is one of the oldest and most prestigious universities in Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 都柏林圣三一学院是爱尔兰最古老和最负盛名的大学之一。

sentences.english: The concept of the Trinity is a fundamental doctrine in Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 三位一体概念是基督教的一个基本教义。

detailed_translations.english: a system of Christian belief in which God is seen as existing in three different forms but is one being

sentences.english: She put her shopping in the trolley.
sentences.chinese: 她把购物物品放进了手推车里。

sentences.english: The trolley got stuck in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 手推车卡在了角落里。

detailed_translations.english: a small vehicle with wheels, used for carrying things, especially in a supermarket or shop

sentences.english: I'm in trouble with the police because of a minor traffic violation.
sentences.chinese: 我因为一个小型交通违规而与警方发生了麻烦。

sentences.english: She always seems to find herself in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 她似乎总是让自己陷入麻烦。

sentences.english: Can you help me out of this trouble?
sentences.chinese: 你能帮帮我摆脱这个麻烦吗？

detailed_translations.english: a situation that causes difficulty or worry

detailed_translations.chinese: 使陷入困境；给…带来麻烦
detailed_translations.english: to cause someone to be in a difficult situation

sentences.english: She took a deep breath and held it in her tube.
sentences.chinese: 她深深地吸了一口气，并将其保持在她的管子里。

sentences.english: The child enjoyed playing with the colorful tube of modeling clay.
sentences.chinese: 那个孩子喜欢玩那个彩色的模型粘土管。

sentences.english: The airline lost his tube of toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司弄丢了他的牙膏管。

detailed_translations.english: a long, narrow tube, especially one that is closed at one or both ends
the London Underground system
a device for playing videos or television programs

sentences.english: The miners dug tunnels through the mountain to create a new route.
sentences.chinese: 矿工们挖通了隧道穿过山脉以开辟一条新路线。

sentences.english: The trains run through a series of tunnels under the city.
sentences.chinese: 火车穿过一系列隧道在市区地下运行。

sentences.english: The worms create tunnels in the soil to move around.
sentences.chinese: 蠕虫在土壤中制造隧道以移动。

detailed_translations.english: a long passage dug through rock, earth, or under a building

sentences.english: The tuition fees at this university are quite high.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学的学费相当高。

sentences.english: She is receiving private tuition in mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 她在接受数学的私人辅导。

sentences.english: The government provides free tuition for underprivileged students.
sentences.chinese: 政府为经济困难的学生提供免费学费。

detailed_translations.english: the charge for teaching; instruction in a particular subject

sentences.english: Please tune the radio to the correct station.
sentences.chinese: 请将收音机调到正确的频道。

sentences.english: The musician tuned his guitar before starting to play.
sentences.chinese: 音乐家在开始演奏前调了他的吉他。

sentences.english: We need to tune our strategy to the current market conditions.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要根据当前的市场状况调整我们的策略。

detailed_translations.english: to adjust the pitch or tone of a musical instrument
to change or adapt something to make it suitable for a particular situation
a sequence of notes forming a musical melody

sentences.english: She has a great collection of classical tunes.
sentences.chinese: 她拥有一个很棒的古典乐曲收藏。

sentences.english: The radio station plays a variety of tunes throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 这家广播电台整天播放各种乐曲。

sentences.english: We danced to the tune of the music.
sentences.chinese: 我们随着音乐的旋律跳舞。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of music, especially a popular or familiar one

sentences.english: She is a private tutor who helps students with their homework.
sentences.chinese: 她是一名私人辅导老师，帮助学生完成作业。

sentences.english: The online tutor provided detailed explanations for each problem.
sentences.chinese: 在线辅导老师对每个问题都提供了详细的解释。

detailed_translations.english: a teacher who gives individual or small group instruction, especially in a particular subject
to teach someone, especially privately or in small groups

sentences.english: Please type the password to log in.
sentences.chinese: 请输入密码以登录。

sentences.english: She is a fast and accurate typist.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位打字速度快且准确的打字员。

sentences.english: We need to type this report before the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要在截止日期前完成这份报告的打字工作。

detailed_translations.english: to write or enter text using a keyboard
a particular kind of person, thing, or concept

sentences.english: The umpire made a crucial decision during the game.
sentences.chinese: 裁判在比赛中做了一个关键的决定。

sentences.english: The umpire is responsible for enforcing the rules of the game.
sentences.chinese: 裁判负责执行比赛规则。

detailed_translations.english: a person who officiates at a sporting event, making decisions according to the rules

sentences.english: We need a better understanding of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要更好地理解这个问题。

sentences.english: His understanding of the situation was incorrect.
sentences.chinese: 他对情况的了解是错误的。

sentences.english: She has a deep understanding of human nature.
sentences.chinese: 她对人性有深刻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to understand something; knowledge or realization of a fact or situation

sentences.chinese: 厨房里备有各种烹饪用具。

sentences.english: Please pass me the utensil used for stirring the soup.
sentences.chinese: 请递给我用来搅拌汤的餐具。

sentences.english: This set of utensils includes spoons, forks, and knives.
sentences.chinese: 这套餐具包括勺子、叉子和刀子。

detailed_translations.english: an implement used in a particular activity

sentences.english: The soldiers wore a uniform to maintain discipline.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们穿着制服以维持纪律。

sentences.english: All students at the university must wear a uniform.
sentences.chinese: 大学里所有学生都必须穿制服。

sentences.english: The company provided a uniform for each employee.
sentences.chinese: 公司为每位员工提供了一套制服。

detailed_translations.english: a set of clothes worn by members of a particular group, for example soldiers, police officers, or school children
the same for all members of a group

sentences.english: The European Union is a political and economic partnership between 27 European countries.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟是由27个欧洲国家组成的政治和经济合作组织。

sentences.english: Union members enjoy free movement of people, goods, services, and capital within the EU.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟成员国享受在欧盟内部的人员、货物、服务和资本的自由流动。

detailed_translations.english: an organization of countries, organizations, or people that work together for a common purpose
to bring two or more things together so that they form a single thing

sentences.english: She is studying at the University of Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 她在牛津大学学习。

sentences.english: Many students apply to universities every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年都有许多学生申请大学。

sentences.english: He graduated from Harvard University with a degree in economics.
sentences.chinese: 他以经济学学位毕业于哈佛大学。

detailed_translations.english: an institution of higher education providing undergraduate and postgraduate courses and awarding degrees

sentences.english: Proper usage of the software is essential for maximizing its benefits.
sentences.chinese: 正确使用该软件对于最大限度地发挥其效益至关重要。

sentences.english: The dictionary provides examples of common usage for each word.
sentences.chinese: 这本词典为每个单词提供了常见的用法示例。

sentences.english: The term 'usage' refers to how words are used in context.
sentences.chinese: 术语 'usage' 指的是单词在语境中的使用方式。

detailed_translations.english: the act of using something; the way in which something is used

sentences.english: There is a vacancy for a software engineer in our company.
sentences.chinese: 我们公司有一个软件工程师的职位空缺。

sentences.english: She applied for the vacancy advertised in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 她申请了报纸上刊登的那个职位空缺。

detailed_translations.english: a position in an organization that is available for someone to be employed

sentences.english: We are planning a family vacation to Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在计划一家人的夏威夷之旅。

sentences.english: Many people take a vacation during the summer holidays.
sentences.chinese: 很多人在暑假期间度假。

sentences.english: She loves to travel during her vacation.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢在假期期间旅行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 假期； 度假； 休假
detailed_translations.english: a period of time when you are not working or studying, usually for rest or recreation

sentences.english: We must add value to our products to stay competitive.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须为我们的产品增加价值以保持竞争力。

sentences.english: The value of this antique watch cannot be determined.
sentences.chinese: 这只古董手表的价值无法确定。

sentences.english: He holds a high value in the company for his innovative ideas.
sentences.chinese: 由于他的创新想法，他在公司中具有重要的价值。

detailed_translations.english: the regard that something is held to deserve; the importance, worth, or usefulness of something
to consider something as important or worthwhile

sentences.english: Please provide the specific details of the event.
sentences.chinese: 请提供该活动的具体细节。

sentences.english: The lawyer went through the particulars of the case carefully.
sentences.chinese: 律师仔细地查看了案件的具体细节。

detailed_translations.english: specific facts or information about something

sentences.english: There is a wide variety of fruits available at the market.
sentences.chinese: 市场上有各种各样的水果。

sentences.english: She enjoys reading a variety of books, from fiction to non-fiction.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢阅读各种书籍，从小说到非小说。

sentences.english: The restaurant offers a variety of dishes to suit different tastes.
sentences.chinese: 这家餐厅提供各种各样的菜肴，以满足不同的口味。

detailed_translations.chinese: 多样性；种类；各种不同的东西
detailed_translations.english: the existence of many different types or forms of something

sentences.english: I love to eat a variety of vegetables for a healthy diet.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢吃各种蔬菜以保持健康。

sentences.english: This salad is full of fresh vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 这道沙拉充满了新鲜的蔬菜。

sentences.english: Vegetables are rich in nutrients and fiber.
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜富含营养和纤维。

detailed_translations.chinese: 蔬菜；植物的可食用部分
detailed_translations.english: a plant grown or cultivated for its edible parts

sentences.english: She wore a beautiful velvet dress to the party.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一件漂亮的丝绒连衣裙去参加派对。

sentences.english: The velvet upholstery on the sofa felt luxurious.
sentences.chinese: 沙发上丝绒的衬里摸起来很奢华。

detailed_translations.english: a rich fabric made of woven silk and sometimes cotton or other fibers, with a soft, velvety surface

sentences.english: I need to take my dog to the vet for a check-up.
sentences.chinese: 我需要带我的狗去兽医那里做检查。

sentences.english: The vet prescribed some medication for my cat's ear infection.
sentences.chinese: 兽医给我猫的耳部感染开了些药物。

sentences.english: She is a vet who specializes in animal surgery.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位专攻动物手术的兽医。

detailed_translations.english: a person qualified to treat sick or injured animals
to examine or treat an animal that is sick or injured, typically by a veterinarian

sentences.english: The video conference will start at 3 PM tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 视频会议将于明天下午3点开始。

sentences.english: I recorded a video of the concert for my friends.
sentences.chinese: 我为我的朋友们录了演唱会的视频。

sentences.english: This documentary video provides an in-depth look at the issue.
sentences.chinese: 这部纪录片视频深入探讨了这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: moving images that are recorded and shown as a sequence
relating to or denoting the recording, transmission, or display of moving images

sentences.english: From the top of the mountain, we have a beautiful view of the valley.
sentences.chinese: 从山顶上，我们可以看到山谷的美丽景色。

sentences.english: The view from his apartment window is stunning.
sentences.chinese: 他公寓窗户外的景色令人惊叹。

sentences.english: She gave me a different view of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 她给我提供了对这个问题的不同看法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 景色； 观点； 看法
detailed_translations.english: the sight or scene that can be seen from a particular place
the range of what you can see
to look at something or someone

sentences.english: The small village is nestled in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 这个小村庄坐落在群山之中。

sentences.english: Many people moved to the village from the city.
sentences.chinese: 许多人都从城市搬到了这个村庄。

sentences.english: The village has a population of about 500 people.
sentences.chinese: 这个村庄的人口大约有500人。

detailed_translations.english: a small community in a rural area, typically with its own local government and facilities

sentences.english: Vinegar is commonly used in cooking to add flavor to dishes.
sentences.chinese: 醋通常用于烹饪，为菜肴增添风味。

sentences.english: The smell of vinegar is strong and distinctive.
sentences.chinese: 醋的气味强烈而独特。

sentences.english: Apple cider vinegar is popular for its health benefits.
sentences.chinese: 苹果醋因其健康益处而广受欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid with a sour taste that is made by fermenting alcohol

sentences.english: I need to apply for a visa to travel to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我需要申请签证才能去日本旅行。

sentences.english: The visa allows you to stay in the country for up to three months.
sentences.chinese: 签证允许你在该国停留最多三个月。

sentences.english: She got a work visa to start a new job in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了一份工作签证，开始在加拿大的一份新工作。

detailed_translations.english: an official document that allows a person to travel to or live in a foreign country

sentences.english: The visitor enjoyed the museum's exhibits.
sentences.chinese: 这位访客喜欢博物馆的展品。

sentences.english: We welcome visitors to our annual conference.
sentences.chinese: 我们欢迎参观者参加我们的年度会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 访问者； 游客； 客人
detailed_translations.english: a person who visits a place or organization

sentences.english: Eating a balanced diet ensures you get all the necessary vitamins.
sentences.chinese: 均衡饮食可以确保你摄入所有必需的维生素。

sentences.english: Vitamin C is important for a healthy immune system.
sentences.chinese: 维生素C对健康的免疫系统很重要。

sentences.english: Many people take vitamin supplements to boost their nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 许多人服用维生素补充剂来增强他们的营养。

detailed_translations.english: Any of a group of organic compounds essential in small amounts to animal nutrition

sentences.english: Her vocation as a teacher is to inspire and educate young minds.
sentences.chinese: 她作为一名教师的职业理想是激励和教育年轻的心灵。

sentences.english: He felt a strong vocation to help people in need.
sentences.chinese: 他深感有一种强烈的使命感去帮助有需要的人。

sentences.english: Finding one's vocation can be a lifelong journey.
sentences.chinese: 找到自己的职业使命可能是一段终生的旅程。

detailed_translations.chinese: 职业； 命运； 天职
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of wanting to do a particular type of work or activity

sentences.english: She decided to volunteer at the local charity to help the homeless.
sentences.chinese: 她决定在当地慈善机构做志愿者，帮助无家可归的人。

sentences.english: Many volunteers are needed to assist with the upcoming event.
sentences.chinese: 即将到来的活动需要许多志愿者协助。

sentences.english: He volunteered to take the lead on the project.
sentences.chinese: 他主动请缨负责这个项目的领导工作。

detailed_translations.english: a person who performs a service for others without being paid

detailed_translations.chinese: 志愿；自愿；无偿提供帮助
detailed_translations.english: to offer to do something without being asked or paid

sentences.english: Many volunteers helped at the charity event.
sentences.chinese: 许多志愿者在慈善活动中提供了帮助。

sentences.english: She decided to become a volunteer at the local shelter.
sentences.chinese: 她决定在当地收容所成为一名志愿者。

sentences.english: Volunteers are essential for the success of this project.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者对于这个项目的成功至关重要。

detailed_translations.english: a person who does something without being paid for it

sentences.english: She wore a dress that emphasized her slender waist.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一条强调她细腰的连衣裙。

sentences.english: The tailor took measurements around her waist.
sentences.chinese: 裁缝在她腰部附近量了尺寸。

sentences.english: He exercises to reduce his waist size.
sentences.chinese: 他锻炼以减小腰围。

detailed_translations.english: the narrow part of the body between the chest and the hips

sentences.english: The waiter served the customers with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 服务员带着微笑为顾客服务。

sentences.english: We waited for a waiter to take our order.
sentences.chinese: 我们等待着服务员来点我们的菜。

sentences.english: The waiter brought us the bill.
sentences.chinese: 服务员给我们拿来了账单。

detailed_translations.english: a person who serves food and drinks in a restaurant or bar

sentences.english: She likes to go for a walk in the park every evening.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢每晚在公园散步。

sentences.english: We need to walk carefully on the ice.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要在冰上小心行走。

sentences.english: He walks to work every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天步行去上班。

detailed_translations.english: to move at a regular pace by lifting and setting down each foot in turn, never having both feet off the ground at the same time
the act of walking somewhere

sentences.english: Walking in the park is a great way to relax.
sentences.chinese: 在公园里散步是放松的好方法。

sentences.english: She enjoys walking her dog every morning.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢每天早上遛狗。

sentences.english: Walking is one of the best exercises for overall health.
sentences.chinese: 步行是促进整体健康最好的锻炼之一。

detailed_translations.english: to move along by lifting and setting down each foot in turn
the act of walking somewhere

sentences.english: The wall is painted with vibrant colors.
sentences.chinese: 墙壁被涂上了鲜艳的颜色。

sentences.english: He built a high wall around his property.
sentences.chinese: 他在他的财产周围建了一道高墙。

sentences.english: The ancient wall has stood for over a thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 这座古老的城墙已经屹立了超过一千年。

detailed_translations.english: a continuous vertical brick or stone structure that encloses or divides an area of land or buildings
to build or furnish with a wall

sentences.english: The world is full of wonders.
sentences.chinese: 世界充满了奇迹。

sentences.english: She traveled around the world to experience different cultures.
sentences.chinese: 她环游世界以体验不同的文化。

sentences.english: The internet has connected people all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 互联网将世界各地的人们连接起来。

detailed_translations.english: the planet earth considered as a whole; the earth together with all its people and animals

sentences.english: Global warming is causing extreme weather events around the world.
sentences.chinese: 全球变暖正在导致世界各地发生极端天气事件。

sentences.english: The government has implemented policies to reduce warming.
sentences.chinese: 政府已实施政策以减少变暖。

sentences.english: We need to take action to slow down warming.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要采取行动来减缓变暖。

detailed_translations.english: the gradual increase in the temperature of the Earth's atmosphere and oceans

sentences.english: She was doing the washing up in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 她在厨房里洗碗。

sentences.english: The washing machine is making a lot of noise.
sentences.chinese: 洗衣机噪音很大。

sentences.english: I need to do some washing before I go out.
sentences.chinese: 我出去前得洗点衣服。

detailed_translations.english: the act of washing something; the clothes that have been washed
pertaining to or used in washing

sentences.english: A wasp can sting multiple times.
sentences.chinese: 胡蜂可以蜇多次。

sentences.english: The wasp built a nest in the eaves of the house.
sentences.chinese: 胡蜂在房子的屋檐下筑了一个巢。

detailed_translations.chinese: 黄蜂； 蜂； (昆虫的一种)
detailed_translations.english: a stinging insect similar to a bee but usually smaller and having a slender body

sentences.english: We should reduce waste to protect the environment.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该减少浪费以保护环境。

sentences.english: The factory produces a lot of waste every day.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂每天产生大量废料。

sentences.english: He threw away the food without realizing it was still edible.
sentences.chinese: 他没意识到食物仍然可以食用就扔掉了。

detailed_translations.english: useless or unwanted material, such as food that has been thrown away or liquid that drips from a tap
to use something in a way that is not careful or efficient, so that it is wasted
to be spent or used in a way that is not careful or efficient

sentences.english: The abandoned factory lay in a desolate wasteland, overgrown with weeds.
sentences.chinese: 那座被废弃的工厂位于一片荒凉的废墟上，长满了杂草。

sentences.english: After the drought, the once fertile land turned into a barren wasteland.
sentences.chinese: 干旱过后，曾经肥沃的土地变成了一片贫瘠的荒地。

detailed_translations.english: a barren or desolate area of land, especially one that has been devastated by war, pollution, or environmental changes

sentences.english: She quenched her thirst by drinking some water.
sentences.chinese: 她喝了一些水来解渴。

sentences.english: The drought caused a severe water shortage in the region.
sentences.chinese: 干旱导致该地区严重缺水。

sentences.english: Please remember to turn off the tap after using water.
sentences.chinese: 请使用完水后记得关掉水龙头。

detailed_translations.english: a transparent, colourless, odourless liquid that occurs in rivers, lakes, and the sea, and is essential for the survival of most living things
a device for drawing water from a pipe or tank
to supply water to something or someone

sentences.english: She waved her hand goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 她挥手告别。

sentences.english: The crowd waved flags to cheer the team.
sentences.chinese: 人群挥舞着旗帜为队伍加油。

sentences.english: We saw a wave of tourists visiting the historical site.
sentences.chinese: 我们看到一波游客参观历史遗迹。

detailed_translations.english: a movement of people or things; a large number of people or things moving together
to move your hand or arm in a particular way to show greeting, goodbye, or encouragement

sentences.english: The candle is made of wax.
sentences.chinese: 这支蜡烛是由蜡制成的。

sentences.english: The car's wax coating makes it shine.
sentences.chinese: 汽车上的蜡涂层使其闪闪发光。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is solid when cold and liquid when hot, used for making candles, polish, etc.
to apply a layer of wax to something, especially to make it shine

sentences.english: Wealth does not guarantee happiness.
sentences.chinese: 财富并不保证幸福。

sentences.english: She inherited a great deal of wealth from her ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 她从祖先那里继承了一大笔财富。

sentences.english: The pursuit of wealth often leads to neglecting family and friends.
sentences.chinese: 追求财富往往导致忽视家庭和朋友。

detailed_translations.english: an abundance of money, property, and other assets

sentences.english: The soldier was equipped with a variety of weapons.
sentences.chinese: 士兵配备了各种各样的武器。

sentences.english: This law aims to regulate the possession of weapons.
sentences.chinese: 这项法律旨在规范武器持有。

sentences.english: The police used non-lethal weapons to subdue the protesters.
sentences.chinese: 警察使用非致命武器制服了抗议者。

detailed_translations.english: an object or substance used to inflict injury, death, or damage upon an enemy or victim

sentences.english: The weather in London can change very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦的天气变化非常快。

sentences.english: We need to check the weather forecast before going hiking.
sentences.chinese: 我们去远足前需要查看天气预报。

sentences.english: It's been raining all day; the weather is terrible.
sentences.chinese: 雨一直下了一整天；天气真糟糕。

detailed_translations.english: the state of the atmosphere (including temperature, precipitation, wind, etc.) at a particular time or place

sentences.english: Weeds can quickly take over a garden if not managed properly.
sentences.chinese: 如果不妥善管理，杂草会很快占据整个花园。

sentences.english: He spent hours pulling weeds from the vegetable patch.
sentences.chinese: 他花了几个小时从菜园里拔草。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杂草；不受欢迎的人或事物
detailed_translations.english: plants that grow where they are not wanted, often in a garden or field

sentences.english: I have a busy schedule this week.
sentences.chinese: 我这周日程很忙。

sentences.english: The meeting is scheduled for next week.
sentences.chinese: 会议安排在下周。

sentences.english: She works five days a week.
sentences.chinese: 她每周工作五天。

detailed_translations.english: a period of seven days

sentences.english: He works on weekdays and has weekends off.
sentences.chinese: 他工作日在上班，周末休息。

sentences.english: Most people prefer to take their vacations on weekdays to avoid crowds.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人更喜欢在 weekdays 度假，以避免人群。

detailed_translations.english: a day that is not a weekend day

sentences.english: I usually relax and spend time with my family on the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我通常在周末放松并与家人共度时光。

sentences.english: The weekend is the best time to go hiking or biking.
sentences.chinese: 周末是远足或骑自行车的最佳时间。

sentences.english: Many people use the weekend to catch up on chores they didn't have time for during the week.
sentences.chinese: 许多人利用周末来完成在周内没时间做家务。

detailed_translations.english: the period at the end of a week when people do not work

sentences.english: The weight of the package is 5 kilograms.
sentences.chinese: 这个包裹的重量是5公斤。

sentences.english: She lost weight after following a strict diet.
sentences.chinese: 她在遵循严格饮食后失去了体重。

sentences.english: The truck can carry a maximum weight of 10 tons.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车可以承载最大10吨的重量。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of matter in a thing; the force with which a thing is pulled by gravity
the amount that a person or animal weighs
the importance or value of something

sentences.english: The government provides welfare services to support the needy.
sentences.chinese: 政府提供福利服务来支持有需要的人。

sentences.english: Employee welfare includes health insurance, paid leave, and retirement plans.
sentences.chinese: 员工福利包括健康保险、带薪休假和退休计划。

sentences.english: Welfare reform aims to improve the quality of life for low-income families.
sentences.chinese: 福利改革旨在提高低收入家庭的生活质量。

detailed_translations.chinese: 福利；福利制度；福利待遇
detailed_translations.english: the state of being healthy and happy; financial support given, typically by the state, to people in need

sentences.english: We drove all the way from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 我们从东边一直开车到西边。

sentences.english: The sun sets in the west.
sentences.chinese: 太阳落在西边。

sentences.english: She is traveling west to east.
sentences.chinese: 她正从西向东旅行。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or denoting the west
towards or in the west
the direction towards the west; the west side of a place

sentences.english: The wetland is a crucial habitat for many species of birds and fish.
sentences.chinese: 湿地是许多鸟类和鱼类的重要栖息地。

sentences.english: Conservation efforts are focused on protecting the unique biodiversity of wetlands.
sentences.chinese: 保护工作集中在保护湿地的独特生物多样性。

sentences.english: Wetlands play a vital role in filtering pollutants from water.
sentences.chinese: 湿地在过滤水中污染物方面发挥着至关重要的作用。

detailed_translations.english: a area of land that is covered by water, either permanently or at least temporarily

sentences.english: The blue whale is the largest animal on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 蓝鲸是地球上最大的动物。

sentences.english: Whales are mammals that live in the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼是生活在海洋中的哺乳动物。

sentences.english: Whales communicate with each other using sound.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼通过声音进行交流。

detailed_translations.english: a very large mammal that lives in the sea and breathe air through a blowhole

sentences.english: The car's wheel is flat.
sentences.chinese: 汽车的车轮瘪了。

sentences.english: He fell off the bike when the wheel came off.
sentences.chinese: 当车轮脱落时，他从自行车上摔了下来。

sentences.english: The wheel of progress never stops.
sentences.chinese: 进步的轮子永不停歇。

detailed_translations.english: a circular frame fitted with handles or levers around a central shaft, allowing it to turn freely and be used for moving something along a surface or for steering a vehicle

sentences.english: The width of the river is about 50 meters.
sentences.chinese: 这条河的宽度大约是50米。

sentences.english: What is the width of this table?
sentences.chinese: 这张桌子的宽度是多少？

sentences.english: The width of the door doesn't fit through the hallway.
sentences.chinese: 门的宽度无法通过走廊。

detailed_translations.english: the measurement or extent of something from side to side

sentences.english: The willows grow along the riverbank.
sentences.chinese: 柳树长在河岸边。

sentences.english: The wind rustled through the willows.
sentences.chinese: 风在柳树间沙沙作响。

detailed_translations.english: a type of tree with long, soft branches and large leaves that grows near water

sentences.english: The wind blew the leaves across the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 风把树叶吹过了草坪。

sentences.english: We can feel the wind on our faces.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以感觉到风拂过我们的脸。

sentences.english: The wind is strong today.
sentences.chinese: 今天风很大。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially one that blows from a particular direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 使旋转； 缠绕； 吹动
detailed_translations.english: to move something by blowing on it

sentences.english: The bird quickly spread its wings to take flight.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿迅速展开翅膀起飞。

sentences.english: The wings of the airplane are essential for generating lift.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的机翼对于产生升力至关重要。

sentences.english: She felt like she had wings and could fly after achieving her goal.
sentences.chinese: 在实现她的目标后，她感觉自己像长了翅膀一样可以飞翔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 翅膀； 翅膀状物； 支持者； 分支机构
detailed_translations.english: either of the two paired structures on the thorax of birds that enable flight

detailed_translations.chinese: 翅膀； 支持者； 分支机构
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who support a particular person or political party
a subsidiary or branch of a larger company or organization

sentences.english: The word 'hello' is commonly used to greet someone.
sentences.chinese: 单词 'hello' 通常用于问候某人。

sentences.english: She forgot the word she wanted to say.
sentences.chinese: 她忘了她想说的那个词。

sentences.english: The dictionary contains over 100,000 words.
sentences.chinese: 这本词典包含超过10万个单词。

detailed_translations.english: a unit of language, consisting of one or more spoken sounds or written letters, that has a specific meaning
to express or communicate something in words

sentences.english: The company is expanding its workforce to meet the growing demand.
sentences.chinese: 为了满足不断增长的需求，公司正在扩大其劳动力队伍。

sentences.english: Automation has reduced the need for human workforce in manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 自动化减少了制造业对人工劳动力的需求。

sentences.english: A skilled workforce is crucial for the success of any project.
sentences.chinese: 一个熟练的劳动力队伍对于任何项目的成功至关重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 劳动力；工人队伍；员工队伍
detailed_translations.english: the group of people who work for a company or country

sentences.english: He is working on a new project.
sentences.chinese: 他正在做一个新的项目。

sentences.english: The company is working to improve its customer service.
sentences.chinese: 该公司正努力改善其客户服务。

sentences.english: She has been working long hours to meet the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 她一直在长时间工作以赶上截止日期。

detailed_translations.english: operating or functioning; engaged in work

sentences.english: He was wounded in the leg during the battle.
sentences.chinese: 他在战斗中腿部受伤。

sentences.english: The wound healed quickly with proper care.
sentences.chinese: 在适当的照顾下，伤口很快就愈合了。

sentences.english: She suffered a deep psychological wound from the incident.
sentences.chinese: 那件事给她造成了深刻的心理创伤。

detailed_translations.english: a cut, break, or injury in the skin or flesh
to injure someone or something, especially by causing a cut or break

sentences.english: Writing is an essential skill for any professional.
sentences.chinese: 写作是任何专业人士都必备的技能。

sentences.english: She enjoys writing stories in her free time.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢在空闲时间写故事。

sentences.english: The book is filled with insightful writing on various topics.
sentences.chinese: 这本书充满了关于各种主题的深刻见解。

detailed_translations.english: the activity or work of writing something; the product of this activity
to form letters or words on a surface, typically to record information or express ideas

sentences.english: They celebrated their fifth year of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 他们庆祝了结婚五周年。

sentences.english: The company has been in business for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司已经经营了一年多。

sentences.english: We spend a year studying abroad.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了一年时间在国外学习。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 365 or 366 days, divided into 12 months

sentences.english: She practices yoga every morning to stay flexible and relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 她每天早上练习瑜伽以保持柔韧和放松。

sentences.english: Yoga can help reduce stress and improve your overall well-being.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽可以帮助减少压力并改善你的整体健康。

sentences.english: Many people enjoy the meditative aspect of yoga.
sentences.chinese: 许多人喜欢瑜伽的冥想方面。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瑜伽（一种结合了身体姿势、呼吸技巧和冥想的锻炼形式）
detailed_translations.english: a Hindu spiritual and ascetic discipline which aims to control the body and mind, and achieve spiritual enlightenment

sentences.english: Youth is a time of great opportunity and energy.
sentences.chinese: 青春是充满巨大机遇和活力的时期。

sentences.english: She spent her youth traveling around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她把青春时光花在了环游世界上。

sentences.english: Many people feel that youth is the best time of life.
sentences.chinese: 许多人觉得青春是人生最好的时光。

detailed_translations.english: the period from birth to maturity

sentences.english: The temperature dropped to zero degrees last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚气温降到了零度。

sentences.english: He scored zero points on the test.
sentences.chinese: 他在考试中得了零分。

sentences.english: We need to start from zero and build everything again.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要从零开始，重新构建一切。

detailed_translations.english: the number consisting of one digit before the first non-zero digit in a number system
equal to zero
